column3:
“This is one of my favorite strains!!!  I am a daily user and the effects for me are very strong and intense and, very enjoyable.  For me, mostly a head high.  It makes me talkative, happy, goofy and generally in good spirits.  I could still focus on tasks, as long as they weren't too complicated.  For me this is definitely a strain where you want to be in an unstructured or party environment.
I would suggest using t...”

“iraq war vet here,

hooah. just got back from my 7th tour of duty. ever since #2 i've had severe ptsd/major depression/schizophrenia. girl scout cookies really cleared most of it up for me. these meds are best used while writing lyrics.

was having a lot of pain in my body and now it is gone for as long as the meds are working. won't bring back 1st Class Private Ludin but it sure as hell made me forget about the day ...”

“Sometimes you just wanna get high because getting high feels good. You don't want get loaded to write the next great American novel or shred powder up in Whistler or frag n00bs in Counter-Strike -- y'just wanna get high and groove to Pink Floyd. Well, Girl Scout Cookies knows all about your cravings for some melodious Prog Rock goodness. Have you ever heard about that thing where if you start Dark Side of the Moon at...”
“This is what I've been smoking recently when I don't need to do" anything. If you're like me
column4: you'll want to make sure the floor is clear of tripping hazards
column5: your laptop is away from your water

column1: Set out some snacks before you start smoking
column2: and make sure you're in a safe environment.

column1: Hybrids generally put me in the couch more than Indica
column2: but GSC makes fine motor skills especially hard. It's also especially de...”"

column3:
“Great strain! True to Leafly's description, it WILL send your mind on a helluva journey! I've had this before a few times, but it seems like this time, it really shines! I strongly recommend smoking this out of a pipe or chillum. Anything with water in it like a bubbler or a bong just cuts down on its potency. Definitely use a small bowl pipe, you don't need alot of it if you're smoking by yourself.

It seems like it...”

“This is a treat I rarely get to experience. Upon opening the package, an all-encompassing aroma washes over me, putting a grin immediately on my face. And it is so beautiful. Whoever made this needs medals. Lots of f*****g medals. After the first taste, happiness rushes in. So tasty. I can't believe what I am experiencing. It feels like I'm becoming a child again. A very focused child. Focused on eating that is! And ...”

“This is the most beautiful experience I have ever had. I don't feel worthy of the amazing journey this strain has afforded me. I've tried so many strains trying to find a feeling of happiness and this is it. This is heaven. This is life. I just feel so much love for the world. My entire body vibrates. I turned off the oven and decided not to binge eat so that I could meditate instead. Purity and comfort. Beautiful pl...”

“I first thought this strain was a bit weak or at least the batch I had. but then it creeps on you so hard! one of my favorite strains. I don't get the super munchies with it, but food some how tastes amazing no matter what. amazing anxiety reducer and it's a calm head high for me. you can get things done while smoking this strain, but also relax with it.”

“OMG. 💣 Sweet and earthy aroma with a pungent twist! The name says it all. Who doesn't love GSC? Keeps me relaxed and euphoric. .lol. 22.5% THC with higher than normal CBDs this flower is beloved by the medicinal puffer and recreational puffer. Helps out pain, nausea, and people with eating disorders. Excellent hybrid! OGkush&DurbianPoison made one beautiful offspring. .oouuuweeee!!”

“My absolute favorite strain as of 2016. I love this strain because I can take a hit or 2 before the start of my day and at the end of the day I can take some bong rips and sleep like a baby. It helps with my burden of anxiety on a daily basis. A must for us riddled with mental illness, loss of appetite or insomnia. Highly recommended my loves.”

“I'm in love with this strain. I have chronic pain and one hit feels like a warm bath. I suffer from panic attacks and Gsc doesn't make me paranoid or anxious at all. Perfect for daytime use. No couch lock. I can still function and carry on conversations without tripp'n. Makes me feel like I did when I first started smoking back in the day. Not a care in the world and a permagrin on my face. Also, amazing with Led Zep...”

“I can't say enough about this strain. I have panic attacks and severe back pain. I was taking all kinds of pills, then decided to try marijuana. Girl Scout Cookies was the first strain I tried. I was suffering from a very painful sciatica pain, took a puff and within seconds, I felt no pain at all. I was amazed that something could have such a quick effect. This strain is part of the reason, marijuana is legal medica...”
“It was actually my first time smoking GsC 10 min. Ago. And boy, what a good ass strain. Really soft and smells super good. And it leaves a good aftertaste that leads right into a full body high.”
“I absolutely love this strain the smell the look omg its outstanding!! The compact flowers the plant produces make for a good joint 👌”
“I'm on another planet.”
“if your down in the dumps u need this I promise you.”

“I finally got my hands on the legendary Cookies, and I was not dissapointed. The smell and taste are very unique, unlike any strain I've tried. Many describe the smell as fresh baked cookies, though I'd describe it more as the aftermath of cookie baking. The high is very, very nice. Anxiety, stress and pain disappear almost instantly. The head high is quite focused. The perfect high. I typically disregard trends, as ...”
“🚀..BE PREPARED" for this girl scout!..I just received my Cookies badge for smoking this at wake 'n bake with a cup of CannaBliss coffee..Beautiful green-purple nugs with orange hairs smoke smoooth
column4: intense euphoria hits fast and creeeps. "Lasts a long time" Creative
column5: Focused
column6: Energizing...Pain Zapper_Anxiety Blaster...a Fun Happy high! Thank you YHS for this Beautiful  Bud...  😍COURAGE CONFIDENCE CHARACTER🚀.”"

column3: “Exceptional herb, now firmly placed in my Top 3 go-to meds for pain relief, nausea & lack of appetite, and insomnia.  The Gsc hit me quickly after my first hits off a hot-water bong with an inline stem precooler. The effects were fully realized after about 10 minutes, and included the mild body tingling noted by some previous reviewers, v good pain relief, reduction in nausea with increase in appetite, and an overall...”

“Be very careful with the cookies, you don't feel it right away, and this tastes super sweet, so it will sneak up on you can get you to a high that can be dizzy and unpleasant for the inexperienced. I would recommend smoking a few hits at a time and waiting a few minutes between hits before you just  dive in. If used correctly the cookies can produce the best high you ever had with the energy and focus of durban and t...”

“100% my current favourite strain. GSC is a very uplifting and almost surreal high. It made me very relaxed while also letting my thoughts flow. It kept me very happy  and smiling throughout the entire high. Only downside I can find for GSC would be the dry mouth throughout most of the high (which is not uncommon). Although you get the dry mouth, if you've got access to something to drink then you'll be perfectly fine...”

“One of the best strains I've found for migraine relief, but not for when I have to remember how to do things. Two hits and I'm gone. Very potent. Interesting taste too. Kinda woody, kinda sweet, kinda spicy. Good balance of sativa and Indica effects.”

“I have 40+ years experience growing and using cannabis, a masters degree in agri/horticulture from MSU. This review is more of a warning and a review than most of my other reviews. The review is of the actual flower which I have never produced myself but am pretty sure I have sampled the real deal. I agree with every positive review, if you indeed get the real deal but my warning is that with the exception of the flo...”
“This kind of high is why we smoke pot.”

“One of the best strains i've smoked. It gives a good body and mind high, which doesn't make you lazy and you feel good going out and getting stuff done. I use this strain daily and I absolutely love it. Perfect strain to go hiking with, it's definitely up lifting. This strain really distracts you from all the other things which are going on around you and makes you focus on one thing at a time. I encourage people who...”

“Girl Scout Cookies is a strain I had heard a lot about so when I got the opportunity to try it I was excited.  I loved the  earthy yet sweet smell and the pungent, but not overpowering flavour that was also sweet and earthy.  This strain launched my body into full relaxation with a smooth cerebral high.  This is the perfect daytime strin for me as it helps with my pain and nausea without making me locked to the couch...”
“Just picked this up from the caregiver, fell in love just looking at the bag. Great smell, fruity earthy, lots of purple throughout and darker green with lots of pistols. Great strain!”

“Found this strain really nice smoke. Smoke is very smooth. Found taste to be minty on inhale and exhale to be slight chocolate  undertones. My legs and body went completely numb. But still a great head high.”
“Definitely the strain to try. Rapper's advertise it like it's that deal... Well, some rapper's don't lie, and this strain is tha shit...”

“Five rips from the bong and I'm GONE!! This flower is real stinky, but the  colors are awesome, mostly purple with strands of brown and green, super enticing! The high is strong and cerebral, but clear, plenty of energy and creativity. Awesome anytime flower. Very potent strain I love every time!”

“This stuff is soothing and uplifting at the same time! Excellent for depression, really, really improves your mood. Also, it's not a couch-potato maker. Go lightly, and you'll be fine with most daily tasks. It's relaxing. Good for nausea and lack of appetite too. It's a pleasant smoke, not stinky or cough-inducing. I plan to keep some around!”

“I see a lot of debate about Gsc. Its a very good, sweet tasting and smelling herb. Its not the most potent ive ever smoked but gave me a very strong relaxing head high. No paranoia or too much anxiety, but be cafeful because it is potent. It has the perfect balance of indica sativa. Very clear head buzz with just enough body. Gave me energy but not too much. I feel like I can go walking, play games or do taxes, it do...”

“Smells like cookie dough, tastes like it too ( I vaped). 

Initial high very relaxing and uplifting, becomes euphoric and makes your eyes glaze over. 

Muscle pains, headaches, and anxiety be gone, with half a bowl for a heavy medicator. 

Mental clarity, floaty-ness and giggles are a pleasant state with the GSC.”

“I like GSC. It helps the fibromyalgia pain as well as the anxiety caused by both PTSD and Bi-polar disorder. I am praying that PTSD will be given as a legitimate reason to use medical marijuana. My PTSD is a result of sexual abuse/rapes. I began smoking pot as a teenager not really knowing at the time I was self medicating." I began suffering flashbacks when I was 28 and the trigger was my son turn 5
column4: the age that I...”"

column3: “This strain has been so hyped that I don't know if it is placebo affect or it really is as good as advertised. But started off with an amazing bodily relaxation and moved into one of the best cerebral euphoria states I've ever been in. Great hybrid that truly does affect mind and body. I love the sweet and earthy smell and taste.”
“Can't go wrong with the GSC.  Great for my anxiety, headaches, and depression.”
“My favorite strain for years now. Gets rid of my pain and anxiety. Recently introduced it to my girlfriend and she has found the same effects. Great strain, great smoke.”

“This strain is really strong and it will hit you within seconds. God, Girl Scout cookies relaxes me like no other. I have bad anxiety and it really helps. With Girl Scout I also have very deep thoughts and I get creative. The only negative I can think of is that I find it hard to remember things when I smoke this. Lol amazing strain, would buy again”

“One of my favorites to smoke with a few friends or unwinding after work. Amazing taste and smell, very sticky buds. High usually lasts 2-3 hours. Can give you hella munchies if you smoke too much but doesn't really seem to make you sleepy on the comedown which is a plus to me.”

“I feel like this hybrid is one of the most balanced. No racy thoughts, no racy heart rate. It's one of the few strains that let's me get away with doing anything throughout the day or just to relax at night before bed.”

“I feel like this hybrid is one of the most balanced. No racy thoughts, no racy heart rate. It's one of the few strains that let's me get away with doing anything throughout the day or just to relax at night before bed.”
“Incredible jelly foot. Very nice body pudding. Creativity mixed with amazing peaks of HD colors. 6 Volcano recycles ♻️”

“GSC is a connoisseur strain, and a slutty one too. she finds herself with everybody- and if you haven't gotten a piece of her, I recommend you do. one puff chocolate two puff cookie dough three puff staring at the veins in my hand. blown and it smells like grannys baking in the kitchen.. medicine at its finest when grown right.”

“One of my favorites to smoke with a few friends or unwinding after work. Amazing taste and smell, very sticky buds. High usually lasts 2-3 hours. Can give you hella munchies if you smoke too much but doesn't really seem to make you sleepy on the comedown which is a plus to me.”

“A high quality strain for the masses :)   Smoked half a bowl out of a small glass pipe... the smell was a little bit of mint and a little bit of  soapy smell mixed in with the scene of pine.  The taste was Minty, Piney and Earthy.  I was almost tempted to describe this high that as creeping up on ya... but then I realized I was about 50 yards into my walk to the taco shop, which is about a mile away from where I live...”

“4.8/5
Ohhh man, what can I say about the classics? Got this in another nug run, extracted out to 90.8 percent! Dark and piney with a smell just like the plants themselves, Consistency reminds me of a hair thicker than clear (sometimes a good freeze makes a hell of a difference). A-MAZING for a daily driver. Pain relief without the dab crash. This is the best way to get every positive effect THC can provide.”

“Ok, here's where i stand with GSC. it's a very nice high when you smoke. It has very sweet and earthy undertones. It has a tendancy to creep up on you, and before you know it, you're on a trip. I didn't feel any paranoia. Except for the usual can anyone tell I'm high?" but i do feel slightly dizzy when i mellow out. If you're prone to getting dizzy when you smoke i would recommend a small dose of GSC. However it doe...”"
“Definitely one of my favorites, amazing pain reliever and a must try for anyone wanting to get rid of pain quick, the keif is also absolutely wonderful as well!”

“Girl Scout Cookies makes me happy like a box of shortbread. I'm very happy as I type this. It's not harsh on the throat at all, I could keep toking till the j was faced. I suggest smoking while watching Amazing World of Gumball.”
“1 gram Select GSC vape(56% thc)..Be Prepared" for this verry FUN high!..Silliness/Laughter Alert!! 😘great for not-so-focused conversations with friends..dance
column4: hike
column5: clean or create🎨..be ready for a Joyous time! Keeps my Chronic Pain and Fatigue in check..and a little goes the distance..I Highly recommend to all my canna-Friends..Jah &✌...”"

column3: “this is my favorite flower. It never fails to bring a smile to all who I share with! It helps my anxiety, makes me hungry, gives me a positive feeling, and is the strain I buy 95% of the time. This is my medicine for depression, works better than any pills I've taken in 22 years, and is my daily go to strain! it even makes my crabby boyfriend smile!!! Someone mad? Give them a puff of girl scout cookies and wait 10 mi...”

“Yummy Yummy Yummy. Tried this delicious treat for the first time and I am very pleasantly surprised. You want bang for your buck, get you some of this! Great full body pain management and when I was ready to sleep I fell right out. Bonus was I woke up after my 4 hour nap and was still feeling great. Get You Some!!!”

“In the mid-16th century, when the tulip was first introduced there, Western Europe fell in love with the new flower.  The Dutch simply couldn’t get enough of the late blooming Tulip, contract prices on bulbs soared to ten times the average annual income of a skilled craftsman - for a single bulb!  What goes up, must come down, and prices quickly collapsed, resulting in what many economists say is the first economic...”
“GSC is probably my new favorite strain.   A little does go along way.  Had a couple of puff from my vape pen before work.  Nice feeling, focused, and able to get things done.   Very nice!”

“Positive:
Absolutely amazing relaxing agent. Feel so light after a few hits.
Food tastes just amazing.
Everything becomes so much better.
After about two hours, you go into the sleep mode where you get awesome sleep for at least 8-9 hours.

Negative:
Some serious dry mouth - have hydration handy.
Indica dominant, not ideal for daytime high or if you want to stay awake for some time.”

“Works very well for me for a functional high that effectively treating the multitued of medical problems I developed in my 13 years in the Army.  Everything from from spinal injuries and nerve damage to anxiety.  I like using it in the morning and through the day.  It's a good sativa heavy hybrid.”

“I remember when Girl Scout Cookies was just on my Bucket List. But the day I actually smoked it was life changing. It felt like it happened so soon. The High was Unexplainably Amazing. It lifted me up so damn High, completely in my. own Zone. The Bud was a Beautiful Light Green with Bright Orange, Bright Purple, and very Frosty. The.taste is Minty Fresh like a Thin Mint Girl Scout Cookie with Chocolate as well. This ...”

“I was taking prescription migraine medicine since I was seven, it did all kinds of bad things to me. Gsc was the first cannabis strain I ever smoked.   I was able to stop taking my horrible prescription medicine, and went without so much as a headache for six months! Prior to finally opening my mind up to cannabis, I was prude and against it. Now, I am completely green and #JustSayingKnow".  Gsc was a life changer f...”"

“This is my go-to-strain when I'm ready for a relaxed creative state. I use it for the light aches and pains days, when I need to sit at my desk. Unfortunately, sitting for too long causes me pain, but if I get up when my alarm goes off every 40 minutes and take a short walk after a few puffs, I can keep the routine up throughout the day - making me a very productive person. Being able to hit my word count makes me ha...”

“Personally this is my favorite strain of Cannabis mainly because of the sweet aroma of this strain and the amazing taste of the cookies. It's easy to tell real Girl Scout Cookies from people merely claiming they have GSCs as these buds stand out with their crystals and hairy structure. If you ever have a chance to smoke some of this strain know you're in good hands. -PineapplePrincess”
“Felt absolutely great. Extremely happy and giggly and my stress and PMS symptoms were exhaled with the smoke! Highly recommended.”

“Nice herb here.. Always a good strain to make it thru a day. Earthy, not as strong in smell all the time. I always smoke this strain before produce music. Helps you with creativity in my opinion. - bud :)”

“Unlike any strain I've ever consumed. Wife and I vaped a small bowl tonight. Took about 3 hits each. At first it was just a light buzz, then it crept up on us and in about 5 min we were pretty nice. Wife was happy and upbeat, said she felt great. I felt the same. Relaxed, happy, no anxiety, light munchies. Heres the unique thing we found about it: we could sort of pause our high and have a serious discussion, then re...”

“I love the GSC original strain the best I think. It's amazing. Body high and an amazing heady, creative and introspective high at the same time. Great for getting lost in thought. GSC is my absolute fav, you won't be disappointed”

“I love the GSC original strain the best I think. It's amazing. Body high and an amazing heady, creative and introspective high at the same time. Great for getting lost in thought. GSC is my absolute fav, you won't be disappointed”
“Girl Scout cookie (crumble) is great for pain, sleep.”
“This strain will definitely knock you off you're ass! Great high but for non smokers don't have this be you're first strain to smoke if you are not a avid smoker. This one will get ya 🙃”
“this hybrid strain works well for anxiety as it provided immediate relief.  I will be trying this again.”

“One of my all time favorites and a go-to strain for lowered anxiety and an overall sense of relaxation and creative awareness.  Excellent auditory sensations ... music is utterly delightful.  Also excellent for increasing libido and general sensuality.  Beautiful, sweet scent (almost like cotton candy at the first clean smoke) and great vibrant green color.”
“Nothing has hit me harder in a while.”

“They say the Cali people keep this a secret, but this Coloradans must know something just as good. I bought some Grape Skunk which was on sale. Not that great. I picked up some Girl Scout Cookies because I loved the name and the product they represent (Girl Scouts should be allowed to sale their cookies in front of dispensaries!) and because it smelled like a  dream come true. I never knew weed could smell so delicio...”
“You want to base your review on how stinky your GSC is. Yes, stinky because Durban is like wet socks.  In a good way.  Penetrating high.  bs”
“Got my wife pregnant after we shared a rather large j of GSC.... I was trying to pull out”

“A top 10 favorite strain of mine.  The durban poison and cherry pie makes for an unforgettable sativa dominant experience.  It's the trippiest shit ive had. Time slows way down and I'm either deep in though kr laughing uncontrollably while my mind races, much like a good trip.  The taste is a little like purple bisquick.  A strain thats a must havd from time to time. The purp in the genetics keeps the durban poison f...”

“They say the Cali people keep this a secret, but this Coloradans must know something just as good. I bought some Grape Skunk which was on sale. Not that great. I picked up some Girl Scout Cookies because I loved the name and the product they represent (Girl Scouts should be allowed to sale their cookies in front of dispensaries!) and because it smelled like a  dream come true. I never knew weed could smell so delicio...”

“Excellent, very strong flavor and very fruity aroma. Bright green flowers coated in crystals and big orange hairs. Gives a very nice balance of indica and saliva traits, leaving you relaxed but not lethargic.”

“Extremely potent! Not for beginners! Perhaps the most powerful strain to date. Just a tiny, and I mean tiny hit is all you need and you will cough for a minute or two but then get ready for the ride. Hits hard and quickly and lasts a good long time. Its just amazing how potent this is and it's no wonder some dispensaries will not carry it from what I heard due to its extreme potency. Overall if you can handle it, it'...”

“This is the 4th time that I've had Girl Scout cookies and everytime I fall in love all over again I've been stuck is with some midshelf nugs for the last week or two , and thank the Lord I got a delivery of rock OG and Girl Scout cookies. A loaded up the silver Buddha with some nice small grindage and vaped away. In less than 5 minutes I couldn't hear right there was massive pressure at the back of my eyes and euphor...”
“Tons of euphoria and a heavy coach lock., Whats not to like? Personally, nothing makes me more hungry- Just blowing through tacos.”

“Girl Scout Cookies~F1 Durban x OG kush although alot of clubs add cherry kush which is fine but not the original GSC strain created in San Francisco.  Adding the cherry kush gives you a whole different high, so i stick to the original formula F1 Durban x OG Kush.  Well where do i start, nugs were like dense rocks covered in crystals with long curly yellow hairs sprouting out of it..making the nug look golden.  Took a...”

“Hit me quick, absolutely amazing strain

One of my favorites. Such an awesome experience”

“Great Great weed, definitely getting some more. At first I was taken back feeling the sativa head smash then not too soon after, I got the relaxing lull of the indica slowly bring me back down to reality”
“Happy high but it made me feel really nostalgic”
“Very nice strain, has a nicr smell to it, also a very great taste. The high was very relaxing and euphoric. A good strain to help with any body pain.”
“Great to blend with a nighttime indica, a heavy hitter. Made for the best sleep aid ever.”

“Girl Scout Cookies~F1 Durban x OG kush although alot of clubs add cherry kush which is fine but not the original GSC strain created in San Francisco.  Adding the cherry kush gives you a whole different high, so i stick to the original formula F1 Durban x OG Kush.  Well where do i start, nugs were like dense rocks covered in crystals with long curly yellow hairs sprouting out of it..making the nug look golden.  Took a...”
“Wow this stuff is amazing. 1 J and felt on top of the world. Great if you have activities that you need to get done. Absolutely 5 stars, top shelf, two thumbs up. 👍👍 cheers!”
“always love girlscout cookies great smell and always looks great... green and purple !! i've grown this strain for two years and its one of my favorites”

“Great dense texture with not too many crystals to get on the fingers, it's deep in the bud. Solid high is my best way to describe it. doesn't pull you in one direction or the other. Smokes nice and creamy”

“Girl Scout Cookies~F1 Durban x OG kush although alot of clubs add cherry kush which is fine but not the original GSC strain created in San Francisco.  Adding the cherry kush gives you a whole different high, so i stick to the original formula F1 Durban x OG Kush.  Well where do i start, nugs were like dense rocks covered in crystals with long curly yellow hairs sprouting out of it..making the nug look golden.  Took a...”

“Great Great weed, definitely getting some more. At first I was taken back feeling the sativa head smash then not too soon after, I got the relaxing lull of the indica slowly bring me back down to reality”
“Very nice strain, has a nicr smell to it, also a very great taste. The high was very relaxing and euphoric. A good strain to help with any body pain.”
“Wow this stuff is amazing. 1 J and felt on top of the world. Great if you have activities that you need to get done. Absolutely 5 stars, top shelf, two thumbs up. 👍👍 cheers!”

“• SO happy to have Curaleaf's PUREs back on the dispensary shelves & in my medicine-arsenal — and none so more than my beloved Girl Scout 🍪! Clocking in @ T-23% with above-average levels of delicious 🌲🍋 terpenes .. Top-floor, yet not over-the-top, euphoric warmth|glow is felt all over my body, as the tasty aphrodisiac-strain reminds me of arousing morning sex-breath of a sexy lover.. •
•👌🏻5-⭐️ for this 🍪.. I ha...”

“I picked up this strain in Arizona from my cab driver. Paid $25 a gram, which I knew was outrageous but I was on vacation and wanted to try this famed strain straight out of San Fran. It was also my first time smoking a blunt and it was by far the best strain I've smoked. Between two of us, we couldn't finish the blunt and lost the stash twice in an hour (it ended up being in the freezer for some reason). GSC definit...”

“All I can say is WOW! I have been smoking for 22 years and I have had this strain a few times but this batch blew my mind. Amazing taste, super dense nugs, very dark purple tones, thick with tricromes, dense flavorful smoke, over all sense of well being. This batch rates up there in the top 5 I've ever smoked.”

“Hit me quick, absolutely amazing strain

One of my favorites. Such an awesome experience”

“Fire!!!! Before I smoked this particular strain I wasn't really into smoking because it didn't really suit me and I didn't get anything out of it. In comes the cookies, the first time I smoked this me and my roommates sat at the kitchen table from about 1-7pm. This was my first experience with what I like to call next level" marijuana. Definitely top 10 and my most sentimental strain. This strain started it all! GSC...”"

“I have tried this now in various forms: hash, wax, flower, oil. It's easily in my Top 3 now, and I need to add this footnote to my previous GSC reviews. 

In regards to FLAVOR-> tied for 1st Place  (w/Cherry Thunderfuck). It is SO tasty + sweet, and I've spent a good-week-now trying to decipher exactly what this flavor reminds me of..! So I fought a good fight, and decided I.MUST.RECALL this — bc not only is the flav...”
“Very nice strain, has a nicr smell to it, also a very great taste. The high was very relaxing and euphoric. A good strain to help with any body pain.”
“Very potent with a strong cerebral high and a good body high without couch-lock. Buds are dark with bright orange hairs and super dense, seriously compact and sticky.”

“I really like this strain. I use it in my convection vape and it's really pleasant tasting. I feel like it goes straight to my eyes and everything looks more vibrant. The burn out isn't too much of a drop either. Munchies are crazy though with this one, I'll agree on that.”
“this strain is great work bud as I call it.  Great uplifting effects without making you tired. I wish this was an actual option on the girl scout cookie list because the taste is amazing. :)”
“The world needs more Gsc. ns”

“Beautiful looking buds coated in a nice sticky layer.  Just looking at it you know it's gonna  pack a punch, and it does.

Busts out nice, smells sweet with a definite note of pine especially after a fresh grind.

Strong medicated feeling with no heaviness.  No burn-out or munchies.

Don't hesitate to buy some and try it if given the chance.  Top shelf indeed.”

“A wonderful strain with up front chocolate notes and a pleasing aroma. The high settles in with a smooth cerebral experience settled by a body calming high. Overall very impressive, I'm naturally anxious but this strain didn't induce those feelings. Just happy and high!”
“Works absolutely great for my anxiety and depression. I was having a hard time finding a strain that helped both and then I came across GSC. Absolutely adore this strain, definitely in my top 5.”

“G.S.C. will forever hold a special place in my heart.
Noticeable hashish flavor and dark buds, usually
smothered in an array of crystals/trichromes.
Beautiful strain for the high more than the looks,
but never disappoints on either end. 
That sweet raw flavor of the after taste from cookies will leave you coming back for more!”
“#ZuluOGStoner,it's one of my favorites strains in the  #GSCFamily.  1.) #SunsetSherbert 2.) #CookiesMonster 3.) #ThinMint 4.) #AnimalCrackers 5.) #GirlScoutCookies”
“The world needs more Gsc. ns”
“this strain is great work bud as I call it.  Great uplifting effects without making you tired. I wish this was an actual option on the girl scout cookie list because the taste is amazing. :)”

“I am actually VERY VERY new to smoking. Having Lupus means I deal with PAIN, anxiety, depression and a ton of other crap. Opiates (along with other prescribed meds) have been my go to for over 20 years to treat my pain & discomfort. Now I’ve decided to cross over to the dark side of marijuana 😝 I’ve tried many strains and due to my long term use of opiates, I NEVER actually felt a “high”. BUT MAN OH MAN, Cresco Cook...”

“G.S.C. will forever hold a special place in my heart.
Noticeable hashish flavor and dark buds, usually
smothered in an array of crystals/trichromes.
Beautiful strain for the high more than the looks,
but never disappoints on either end. 
That sweet raw flavor of the after taste from cookies will leave you coming back for more!”
“#ZuluOGStoner,it's one of my favorites strains in the  #GSCFamily.  1.) #SunsetSherbert 2.) #CookiesMonster 3.) #ThinMint 4.) #AnimalCrackers 5.) #GirlScoutCookies”

“By far my favorite strain when it comes to PTSD, depression and/or anxiety. It's also fantastic in the evenings for winding down from a long day. Smoking from a bong will knock u on your butt, so I'd recommend saving that for evenings. It also smells and tastes beautiful, with a sweet fragrance and a woodsy taste that finishes fruity and floral, it's one of my top 3. All in all 5 out of 5 👍👍👍👍👍”
“The world needs more Gsc. ns”
“Theres a fucking good reason Snoop Dogg smokes this regularly, ONE BOWL AND YOU'RE PAST THE FUCKING MOON!!! Seriously, hands down my new favorite strain - also has a nice minty taste to it.”

“Method of consumption - Flower; Smoking. 

---- 
Smell - I will divvy this category up in three pieces; Full flower, grounded up flower, and smoke.

Full - Earthy and pungent. Emphasis on earthy part though. It is very reminiscent of pines, amber resin, and sweet soil.

Ground - The floral notes of sweet berry escaped as soon I worked at grinding. It gave me a visual of wild berry bush growing next to mint stalks in ...”

“This particular strain transported me to an alternate universe filled with the glories of temptation and drive. I labelled this universe shangri-la for every surrounding was calmly euphoric on my epic journey through this exotic utopia.”

“I’ve been using GSC exclusively for the past two weeks to allow for this review. I really like GSC, The main trait that seems to be consistent is; very little Anxiety. Very little. GSC gets you there in a big way. Buy it when it’s available in your ...”
“A mellow high that hits quickly. Light sense of euphoria. I experienced no increased appetite and little to no dry mouth. High Class Strain. Must Try”
“Very pungent. dense buds covered in orange and green with subtle hints of purple. smoked better than it looks. GSC is one of my current go-to strains. Gets the job done.”

“LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVEEE THIS.

column4: Happy & Giggly when enjoying this GSC
column5: No worries

column3:
“One of my absolute favorite strains. I’ve been severely ill for the past 6 months- loss of appetite, drastic weight loss (65 lbs current total), severe pain, nausea, dizziness, and vomiting. I’m an effort to relax and eat I was recommended and tried GSC. I was able to stop stressing of what’s wrong with me, eat slowly, and sleep without intense pain. 

Definitely a must in the stash”
“A mellow high that hits quickly. Light sense of euphoria. I experienced no increased appetite and little to no dry mouth. High Class Strain. Must Try”

“One of the best strains I've ever had. I'm not surprised because OG kush, Durbin poison, and cherry kush are some of my top favorites. Anyway this strain fucked me over big time. Great great high and really good tingling feeling. Long story short bought a 50 bag and the high was better every time. If you ever get a chance get girl scout cookies for sure, won't regret it.”

“Kurvana cartridge.  Wonderful taste! Maybe the best of the popular carts I've tried without compromising process and potency. Great taste turns into chill relax state, muscles and pains start to feel better...then you settle in to comfort. They cost a couple bucks more in my region but seems worth it at this point :). No complaints at all.... update: their oil carts seem to burn quickly.”
“fire!! used for treatment of PTSD , stomach spasm, IBS. even balance hybrid, doesn't give any anxieties!! definitely a great strain, a must try!”

“Every trip is more so a journey with this wonderful weed. Each and every time I have had the pleasure of this strain I have felt all my pains melt away and my enjoyment in the little things in life sprout up. The most minute tasks become enjoyable and memorable.”

“pretty dank buds, smells sour in a real good way. tastes sweet with a hint of thin mints. instantly calm relaxed music sounds pretty good. had a really stressful day at work, so this was one of my go to choices in this situation, was able to get over the stress and watch some nature documentaries.”
“fire!! used for treatment of PTSD , stomach spasm, IBS. even balance hybrid, doesn't give any anxieties!! definitely a great strain, a must try!”

“Second strain ive ever tried. also second time smoking at all. smoked GSC out of a pre-roll and it slowly built up and then hit me hard. i was playing friday the 13th on ps4 and listening to music for a while and it was amazing. lasted a long time. would try again for sure”

“pretty dank buds, smells sour in a real good way. tastes sweet with a hint of thin mints. instantly calm relaxed music sounds pretty good. had a really stressful day at work, so this was one of my go to choices in this situation, was able to get over the stress and watch some nature documentaries.”
“One of my favorite Strains, Girlscout Cookies takes me where I like to be with an excellent euphoric shadow that follows me for hours.  Great for Neuropathy Pain!👍”

“This is a great strain to help with Neurosis. Whenever I smoke this or most other cookie strains I become much more patient and stop caring about all of the little things that give me anxiety. Try this out anytime you have the chance.”

“I personally rate this strain 4⭐. I would rate it 4.5 but sadly this app requires a whole⭐ though I love this app. OK, anyways on with the review. You guys ready? This strain has a very very relapsing pungent smell. The smell from GSC will linger in your nostrils and flow through your pharynx to your mouth where you'll taste a world of earthly bud. An outstanding high, high enough to make you think Jesus was actually...”
“Just tried GSC today and let me tell you how in love I am. 😍”
“This Shit Had Me Smacked....The Body High Was Crazy I Felt Amazing...The Munchies Was A Bitch But Aren't They Always...If I Could Smoke Any Strain It Would Be This One...Gotta Love Weed”

Smoking it was mainly a mellow relaxing feeling. It was great for pain and anxiety, and had a lovely minty taste/scent in the bag.  I’m a weed novice and this one was packed a wallop, but was very soothing and gave me no scary side effects. Recommended!”
“Just tried GSC today and let me tell you how in love I am. 😍”

This is definitely one of the best hybrids out there.  Hybrids like GSC, Blue Dream, White Widow, Jack Herer, and Super Lemon Haze will always be classics.”

GSC got my adrenaline going but needless to say I ...”

“Meh.  I keep trying to like this as much as this site says I should, but I just don't.  I have no idea why it costs so much.  I'll give it another shot if I get a good deal at a different dispensary.”
“best ever.”

“this is the strain we dreamt about when we were smoking shwag back in the day. Looks killer smokes better, great activity herb, my first choice when I’m setting up a weed bar for social situations. Strong enough to make the experienced happy but not so much it wipes out the newb.  No surprise it gets its head kick from Durban Poison (YAY!!) and the wave of body effect more than exerts the Kush.  Good for pains and gr...”
“I love it. so much.”

“This was my first time using GSC. The small bud I smoked, was very smooth going down, with a slightly sweet taste, the exhale heightened the sweetness to an almost honey flavor. Immediately afterword, I went to work out in the flower bed. I had a lot of energy and felt very uplifted. I laughed and joked with my neighbor the entire time I was cleaning up the dead flowers. Really nice strain.”

“Girl Scout Cookies, I can now truly understand all the hype that surrounds Gsc. The flower that I smoked out of my bubbler was top shelf. It was grown flushed and trimmed properly by a dispensary here in Michigan and the exact pheno was Forum Cut".  It provided a wonderful focused and even scaled nature for my Anxiety and ADD.  A little truly does go a long way with Gsc as I could get away with doing 1 or 2 tokes wh...”"
“I love it. so much.”

“update: This strain if you get a legit cut is some of the most powerful bud and is not for beginners. At first I didn't think I could use this strain after overdoing it and literally zombifying myself for 3 hours but realized its just that potent and reducing the dose did it for me. 1 small hit is all it takes for stress and pain relief and it lasts a good long time. This strain is right up there with my all time fav...”

“I bought a gram of this an eighth of Orange Kush the other day because the hype intrigued me.  So did it live up?

Well, first of all let me say yes, it does actually taste like thin mint girl scout cookies. It provides a good, relaxed body stone. Quite enjoyable. However, it's really not *exceptional*. It's solid, and you'll enjoy it, but it's really not the amazing wonder bud you've been told it is. The fact is, ...”
“GSC is one of my favorite strains. Leaves me mellowed out but not fatigued. Smoke too much and don't be surprised when your eyes have a lagging" effect.”"
“Anazing strain. Great for both mind and body. My head and senses are really good and my body is awake but relaxed. Very happy as well. This is a great all over strain.”
“Numbing strain with decent euphoria.”
“This is the best indica strain out there, the flavor is to die for and the high is very strong.”
“it's one my favorite strains it's a pain reliever and always put me in a happy and, energetic mood”
“Puts the pain away! Great too add to tincture mix as well. Helps with muscle spams for me great!”
“berner made this what it is cuz🍁”

“This instantly became one of my favorite strains, got a really good preroll. From that “everything is hilarious” high to profound introspection, creative bursts, and waves of euphoria, this strain was more like a good trip than a high (although I probably smoked a little more than recommended). Would rate six stars if I could. Oh, and put on some Joe Satriani while you smoke this!”
“One of my go to strains forsure. Great for anxiety and pain relief. I perfer sativa dominant but love all phenotypes of this strain.”

“GSC is my first dive into cannabis for medical use (after a long hiatus from recreational use), and needless to say, GSC definitely lives up to its reputation.  Hope this all helps someone out.

Having Fibromyalgia, ADD and Migraines, this strain has been a godsend in helping me treat the differing symptoms I get.  It's been helping to relax the fibro pain, loosen up my muscles, treat my migraines and other more mino...”

“GSC was the very first strain that I smoked & got high from. it was also the one strain i smoked on my very first 4/20.
both amazing experiences. 
to this day I still kick back and enjoy every high I get from GSC and obsess over the sweet burning smell of trichomes pistils and calyxes this strain ever so sweetly provides for a perfect sesh.”
“Very happy. Also could barely leave the couch and Netflix.”
“Fantastic strain! Great smell and flavor. And gets me pretty baked. Medicine of choice.”

“This strain has small tight nugs that look glossy almost due to the Trichomes! The high is very fast paced and feels like time is zipping by but in reality it isn't. The high also brings along some paranoia & a cloudy brain so thinking will be hard so prepare everything before hand”
“Big aroma, sticky buds. First impressions are big pine. Smokes a bit harsh on the throat. tastes sweet like og. Haven't had the giggles in a while so that was nice, definitely munchie inducing.”
“A giggly body high with some slight muscle twitches, feels Indica-dominant”
“Great strain, been coming here a while just because of this one sometimes. Great high in my opinion. Never fails for me”
“berner made this what it is cuz🍁”
“Give yourself this cookie next time you are depressed. This really spins around a negative day. Two vapes and I escaped my depression to enjoy ing a very productive day.”

“Very relaxing and didn’t make me babble like a moron. A good “chill” strain.

“Puts the pain away! Great too add to tincture mix as well. Helps with muscle spams for me great!”

“Great strain, just make sure you have plenty of snacks stocked up 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻”

.”

“The negatives are very typical and tolerable (dry mouth, dry eyes, and slight paranoia).

The head high is very powerful and might be uncomfortable for some.  It's accompanied by a pretty nice body high that falls just short of couch lock.  I was able to get things done while high on this strain but at a very slow rate.

It can inspire creative work but it's much better used for a night on the couch watching netflix....”

“Remember when you were a teenager, and maybe everything was just as crappy for you as it is now, but SO MANY THINGS seemed hysterically funny?? Well, Girl Scout Cookies makes me remember that feeling. 

This is a fabulously fun strain to share with friends. I hung out with my girlfriends and we laughed our behinds off for over 3+ hours! 
(BTW, my friend who has chronic pain said her pain LIFTED after imbibing in GSC....”
“Big aroma, sticky buds. First impressions are big pine. Smokes a bit harsh on the throat. tastes sweet like og. Haven't had the giggles in a while so that was nice, definitely munchie inducing.”
“Big aroma, sticky buds. First impressions are big pine. Smokes a bit harsh on the throat. tastes sweet like og. Haven't had the giggles in a while so that was nice, definitely munchie inducing.”

“More than what I was expecting with this very exceptional bud!

Lime green, mid-sized flowers with a very sweet and spicy aroma. Although not pungent like many OG crosses I've had lately Girl Scout Cookies is the epitome of a pleasant but potent strain. 

The intake is smooth and leaves a fresh earthy taste on the tongue. Definitely incorporate into your decompress from the day or a booster before going out as this m...”

column3: “Gsc isn't my favorite cultivar. It is strong that's for sure, very high thc levels on this baby. But this particular combination of an intensely heady sativa and a super stony indica gives me all the negative effects I hate - namely anxiety, paranoia / major munchies and laziness. It doesn't work for my medicinal needs. It is a tasty smoke with a smooth flavor profile, so I can see why it's a popular strain.”

“GSC is one of my top 3 strains (medical). 
** Use: severe, chronic, spine & joint pain / muscle spasms. Works quickly. It's best for day, but doesn't keep me awake if I use it later.

** Effects: Relaxing. Nice, clear head high. A good, cheerful mood, without being too talkative, giggly or spacey. Able to focus, talk, or read. Easy on throat & no coughing when vaping flower.”

“I have fibromyalgia, degenerative disc disease in my lower back, IBS, anxiety, and depression. GSC works wonderfully for everything above. It is absolutely my favorite newer strain! 4+ puffs = a bit much for me, too high" in fact
column4: but I'm sensitive to pot. Not a terrible head trip but still
column5: a little too high. Stretching and not thinking helps.

column2: Gsc did not create paranoia or social anxiety...essential. I've witnessed ...”"

column3: “Fifty year old weed virgin here. First run with GSC.. I took three good hits from a packed skinny Raw Roller joint. Stoked easy but I didn't like the taste much at all. First effect was a little muddy mind.  Then a mild body buzz that eventually became moderate. I was chatty and jokey with Mrs.  Mule, then frisky. Afterwards I took three more hits as the effects were waning. I went four outa five because it's a nice ...”

“GSC has a super earthy taste, and a mellow, happy high that trickles into a comfortable sleepy feeling. It's the perfect happy medium hybrid. Not too stimulating, not couch-lock inducing, but still very happy and uplifting, and sleepy and relaxing.”
“Top shelf high, a couple hits will leave your body relaxed to the point of internal bliss, while the head high will make you feel stoned as shit”

“This is definitely one of my favorites. It keeps me high for a long time. My eyes can barely open. It's perfect. The perfect body high. And i'm relaxed. I love strains that relax my body. I prefer that over ones that make me feel uppity and anxious. I have anxiety so this makes it much better. I wish I lived in a state where it was legal and I could just go to a dispensary and get it! Ohio will legalize soon hopefull...”

“Tried this from two different dispensaries in Colorado. 

The first time (from Faragosi Farms in Durango) it was heavy but fun. I liked it a lot at first but after a few times, knew I wanted to see if I could find a better bang for my buck. 

The second time (from The Greenery in Durango) it was thick and sucked all my energy out. it was so different than the first, that other than the off chance something was labele...”
“A great strain for pain and treating PTSD”
“After my second try of GSC, I am sold. Excellent pain management strain.”
“This is a top five for me. Great flavor and a very uplifting relaxing feeling. Helps with anxiety and depression as well as pain. I would rate this more like a 4.3 rather this a 4.”
“One of my favorite strains to pick from! Excellent for anxiety and depression. Put you in a perfect relaxation state. Hunger level definitely sky rockets!”

“First time I tried this strain my nugs had a beautiful intense purple colour. Impressed everyone during a huge camping trip. My most memorable and cherished high. I struggle with DID and a lot of different mental health issues but using this strain I felt so comfortable with myself. I recommend this to everyone.”
“Girl Scout Cookies.... Wow. One of the best strains I've ever had, definitely in my top 10 :)”

“I've had 3 examples of this strain in the last few months and all have been great, but the one I picked up today is exceptional. Great head, probably 50-60% purple with orange hairs running through it, just phenomenal. It's too bad I can't leave photos... but anyway this strain is the most uplifting and happy strain Ive found, and it works well with pain also. I have had a C7/C6 fusion 4 months ago and this helps all...”
“One of my favorite strains to pick from! Excellent for anxiety and depression. Put you in a perfect relaxation state. Hunger level definitely sky rockets!”
“Definitely a lovely strain, not to heavy on the head. Nice body high, usually sells out pretty fast, nice yummy taste to it. I would say a bit more sativa side but could just be me”
“wonderful strain. fast acting, doesn't cause anxiety. great for a day in the house taking care of chores or just chilling out.”
“I like this strain because it gets me really high and I can really appreciate my highness”
“A great strain for pain and treating PTSD”

“1 puff = giggly.   

2 puffs = more energized.   

3 puffs = chatty. sassy. still giggly.

4+ puffs = a bit much for me, too high" in fact
column4: but I'm sensitive to pot. Not a terrible head trip but still
column5: a little too high. Stretching and not thinking helps.

column2: Gsc did not create paranoia or social anxiety...essential. I've witnessed ...”"

column3:
“Might sound silly but, I could never quite bring myself to buy this particular strain because of the name. Now that it's known as Gsc it's fair game on my #420bucket list! 

Having a hard time putting the flavour into words. No burning on the back of the throat, but no cooling either. The after taste is really pleasant...it leaves a sweetness in my mouth. 

When I walked back into the room a few minutes after smoking...”
“This is a top five for me. Great flavor and a very uplifting relaxing feeling. Helps with anxiety and depression as well as pain. I would rate this more like a 4.3 rather this a 4.”
“one of the best I have smoked in a while. very happy with this strain. I would recommend this to anyone who suffers from depression.”

“Picked up some GSC from my local dispensary and to my surprise it is as every bit as good as they say... which is awesome.

Comes on strong and goes up and up... very heady high, almost giddy with some nice body effects to boot.

Color me satisfied”
“wonderful strain. fast acting, doesn't cause anxiety. great for a day in the house taking care of chores or just chilling out.”

“Who ever thought that Durban Poison and OG Kush could come together and create this masterpiece of a strain. It's like it tailors the high for just what you need. It is NOT however for newbies. You will get sick if you've never had anything strong. For the pros, this is my number one have-to-have strains.”
“Baton Rouge,Louisiana. .....love this strain great full body effect...music hits the mind and soul......”

“Ah, Girl Scout Cookies. GSC is one of those strains that induces excitement in any cannabis connoisseur at the mere mention of the strain, and for good reason. A few hits of Girl Scout provides me with an uplifting, energetic buzz, while a higher dose hits you like a freight train, with simultaneously heavy cerebral and body effects. An absolutely wonderful strain. A word of warning to cannabis newbies, however: GSC ...”

“Picked up some GSC from my local dispensary and to my surprise it is as every bit as good as they say... which is awesome.

Comes on strong and goes up and up... very heady high, almost giddy with some nice body effects to boot.

Color me satisfied”
“A great strain for pain and treating PTSD”

“New release from mettrum Orange N4 Girl Scout Cookies. Very impressed by the taste cant stop licking my lips. Great high alert,energetic cant wait for my nxt session. 14% Tch lvl with .3 Cbd lvl. Mettrum continues to impress me with there great customer service and products. Only complaint with every order very dry but easily re hydrated. Highly 😎 Recommend trying a bud all the buzz about the cookies is for good rea...”

“Nice and calm strain. It was an O.Pen Vape Craft Reserve and one puff did it for me. Two had me a little zoned and three put me to sleep. I spent a few hours relaxed without any anxiety while still being able to act like a functioning adult. I did have a slight headache in the morning, however, so that was the only downside.”
“Pack St. certified”
“A giggly body high with some slight muscle twitches, feels Indica-dominant”

“Been waiting for G.S.C  and here it is,instant EUPHORIA,which you have to RESPECT,definitely will have you RELAXED,But not to much were your COUCHLOCKED,the sativa side of (g.s.c) allows you to be COMPLETLY functional,by far the best looking and tasting,smoke I've encountered”
“A giggly body high with some slight muscle twitches, feels Indica-dominant”
“Classic, timeless favorite.  Always a joy to sit back with friends and smoke a bowl of something to keep you happy and uplifted.”

“When I first hit this strain of of the bong the high was very intense. I almost didn’t like it, but I just had to get used to it. I’m usually a girl who likes more of high that doesn’t give me a super head high, I like more of an energetic high or a super relaxed high. However once I smoked it out of the vape my high was less intense and that probably because it wasn’t as big of a “bowl”. Either was this high is good...”

“More than what I was expecting with this very exceptional bud!

Lime green, mid-sized flowers with a very sweet and spicy aroma. Although not pungent like many OG crosses I've had lately Girl Scout Cookies is the epitome of a pleasant but potent strain. 

The intake is smooth and leaves a fresh earthy taste on the tongue. Definitely incorporate into your decompress from the day or a booster before going out as this m...”
“Smoothest bud I've ever smoked! Good when you wanna relax. Dries out mouth but not to bad. Would recommend.”
“Great for day and night”
“wonderful strain. fast acting, doesn't cause anxiety. great for a day in the house taking care of chores or just chilling out.”
“Energetic puts you in a happiest mood”

“I like this...it makes me think nothing's happening, then I get the warm blanket.  Sativa very noticeable here but doesn't dominate.  I really do not get the munchies all that much with this strain - but it sure makes me @#$%# horny.

Acquired via Rx Harvest.”

“All thime fav:) Never will get old and never will stop comeing. too much good to say about this beautiful strain i love sure everyone elso does.smells sweet they all do but looks different depending on the grower. enjoy the cookie dough taste in your mouth:)”
“wonderful strain. fast acting, doesn't cause anxiety. great for a day in the house taking care of chores or just chilling out.”
“GSC is a good daytime strain.  Nice euphoria, good happy feeling, I'm just not a huge fan of the taste.”

“I have severe plaque psoriasis, and before I worked out a plan with my insurance company, Girl Scout Cookies kept me balanced as far as mood and health is concerned, plus it happened to reduce some of the rather prominent inflammation caused by the plaque psoriasis, as well as my psoriatic arthritis. This is an outstanding medicinal strain, and I have at least a half ounce stashed at all times because of it.”
“I loved this bud, just had a few hits, totally amazing, and my new favorite !”
“Energetic puts you in a happiest mood”
“I love a weed that takes me out of my own head this happened but tingly as hell. paranoid”

“One of my top 3 fave strains. Currently smoking some as well.

Earthy and sweet. Beautiful nugs. 

Using a liberty 503 pipe.

It has a very clean smooth taste when inhaling.

I haven't hit the point of couch-lock. 

Really just makes me feel happy, helps with my anxiety and gets me eating more .. (high metabolism so I struggle with gaining weight) 

It's why I like this strain so much. 

Just happy , no care in the w...”
“I love a weed that takes me out of my own head this happened but tingly as hell. paranoid”

“Remember when you were a teenager, and maybe everything was just as crappy for you as it is now, but SO MANY THINGS seemed hysterically funny?? Well, Girl Scout Cookies makes me remember that feeling. 

This is a fabulously fun strain to share with friends. I hung out with my girlfriends and we laughed our behinds off for over 3+ hours! 
(BTW, my friend who has chronic pain said her pain LIFTED after imbibing in GSC....”

gsc parents produced a genius”

“Big aroma, sticky buds. First impressions are big pine. Smokes a bit harsh on the throat. tastes sweet like og. Haven't had the giggles in a while so that was nice, definitely munchie inducing.”
“Puts the pain away! Great too add to tincture mix as well. Helps with muscle spams for me great!”
“still top dog love it ever since I tryed it,its a never fail go to strain live it JAH”

“Remember when you were a teenager, and maybe everything was just as crappy for you as it is now, but SO MANY THINGS seemed hysterically funny?? Well, Girl Scout Cookies makes me remember that feeling.

“Easily one of my favorite strains.Head high first,then transforms into a body high.Nice balanced hybrid.Social smoke,music sounds better with it :D , gets you super hungry.Mine has woody smell and taste. Highly recommended. Hit one,go outside.”

“It's named after Girl Scout Cookies for a reason—this stuff makes you crave massive amounts of food, especially sweets. Possibly more than any other strain I've smoked. Good shit though, nonetheless.”

“Big aroma, sticky buds. First impressions are big pine. Smokes a bit harsh on the throat. tastes sweet like og. Haven't had the giggles in a while so that was nice, definitely munchie inducing.”

column3: “Simply one of the best varieties I've tried. I generally keep a few+ varieties on hand for different needs/situations. This strain has become my favorite for the pre-dinner post-work unwind.. Totally melts the days stressors and gets you ready to enjoy dinner..”

“6 inhales and I was flying lol... Very strong strain. The onset is about 3 minutes and it comes of in about 3.5 hours. Short trips but they are very intense and pleasurable”

“berner made this what it is cuz🍁”

“Cresco Cookies - 2 puffs and I’m feeling the happiness. I feel the tightness around my chest (when you have anxiety or PTSD this constant feeling is common) get less intense. The world around me get even more beautiful. Colors are more vivid. I feel my body relaxing as well which is such an amazing benefit of this strain getting both sativa and indica properties mixed. Makes it a easy strain for me to enjoy. A large ...”

“This strain is a real beauty. The flavor is reminiscent of a sugar sweetened cinnamon with a hint of mint and includes subtle fruity undertones. This herb produces a luscious and smooth smoke that tastes great. As a medicine one will find it will leave you in a perfect neutral position. Where one can either sleep or be awake and still quite talkative. You will experience an interesting indescribably euphoric high. Th...”

“My girlfriend and I vaporized GSC last night for the first time, and it was off the charts incredible. One of the most enjoyable and intense {in a good way) experiences I have ever had, and my girlfriend reported a similar experience. All I can say is wow"! I honestly don't know what could top it.”"

“Fantastic strain! Great smell and flavor. And gets me pretty baked. Medicine of choice.”

Zero paranoia and just a calm happy high. So happy. It can be social and it’s great when your alone too. It’s an Indica dominant hybrid effect for me. Comes on really heady and stron...”

“This stuff takes a few minutes to hit you but when it does, get ready for a very Sativa dominate high. Extremely focused, tunnel vision, euphoric feeling in your chest/abdomen (especially if you turn on some feel good music) and just an enjoyable high. Don't do too much though otherwise you'll be put in a more disoriented couch lock state while you're still super focused with tunnel vision. Strong stuff.”

“I'll be honest, at first I thought this strain wasn't as good as it has been hyped up to be. However, this strain has really grown on me. It starts off with a good head high and you slowly slip into a chill and relaxed body high. I highly recommend this strain if you can get it. This is a great strain to begin the boat times on!”

“GSC is a great high.  But you better have a TON of munchies around.  Very strong appetite stimulation.  You'll eat until you cannot eat any more.

Cerebral, relaxing, but you cannot sleep because you will eat for hours and freaking hours.”
“For some reason my high stays longer with this bud than most of the other strains i smoke, but i get super focused on tasks and get shit done which is always appreciated”
“A giggly body high with some slight muscle twitches, feels Indica-dominant”

“Fifty year old weed virgin here. First run with GSC.. I took three good hits from a packed skinny Raw Roller joint. Stoked easy but I didn't like the taste much at all. First effect was a little muddy mind.  Then a mild body buzz that eventually became moderate. I was chatty and jokey with Mrs.  Mule, then frisky. Afterwards I took three more hits as the effects were waning. I went four outa five because it's a nice ...”
“Great daytime smoke with just enough euphoria to offset the depression that comes with chronic pain and I can still function. Very little anxiety or paranoia. No headache. Good stuff Maynard.”
“Not useful if you have any responsibilities to tackle but nice for a good time :+)”
“I love GSC! soo earthy but definitely a Sativa Strain! it has delicious flavor A Must”
“Great daytime smoke with just enough euphoria to offset the depression that comes with chronic pain and I can still function. Very little anxiety or paranoia. No headache. Good stuff Maynard.”
“I love GSC. This strain never seems to let me down... only up, up, up and awayyy! lol I would highly" recommend GSC to my friends and fellow leafly-ers.... Peace&♡♡♡”"

“A classic favorite of ours on Bake N Wake Review (YouTube)! Picked some up to review for the show from a Vegas local. Very sweet and earthy scent, dense nugs. We tried the phenotype, Thin Mint Cookies, recently. This strain definitely helps us feel relaxed after a stressful day without knocking us down completely. A nice pain reliever that doesn't give too much of that couch lock feel. I (Addie) have to deal with nau...”
“Smoke too much I think put me in a coma! lol ....”

“My number one strain for my art work, hands down! I'm so much more creative, music is so immersive, colors are more vibrant, and life is so grand. I'd totally recommend smoking a ton of this at a concert or any time you want your mind drowning in wonderment and imagination.”

“Wow. Talk about a beautiful flower. I took one look at this strain and my jaw dropped. It's so green! Tiny little orange hairs pepper the surface of these gorgeous, sticky, green nugs. Me and two other friends packed one bowl and passed it around for a few minutes, marveling at the lovely, fruity taste. Within minutes we were immersed in a high that reminded me a lot of Blue Dream (one of my all-time favorite strains...”
“Nice and balanced”
“I love Girl Scout Cookies! Taste fabulous but could be a little more potent in my opinion.”
“My favorite strain of all time. Taste just like cookies!”
“I must say smoking GSC is very head banging to me . I love the earthy smell to it it gives it that kick . I smoke with Grabba so adding that to the GSC was amazingly bless.”

“the feeling of the bud is relaxing and a smooth high”
“Love this strain! Such a great high, and packed full of medicine! So many fake cookie strains out there, so be sure you trust your source! I recommend this for any smoker/ patient!!!”

“definitely not a favorite”
“good shit”

“Picked up this strain last week and I've had a number of opportunities to use it to relieve my head pain thanks to our weather in the PNW. Each time it has been great for both lifting the pain and helping me get moving and actually having a great rest of my day. Picked it up at HypeHerbAlly in Everett.”

“Girl Scout has gotten so popular that people have actually started selling other strains under the name. It's the type of weed that will knock you on your ass or have you roaming the streets for hours only to find out your house is right next door. However, it has to be right. I've ran into some places that have sold me clearly what is not the same GSC I've had before.”
“This strain has me very happy and awake. I am very pleased!!!”
“strong shit to sleep”

“Cultivar-- ForwardGro
Dispensary-- RISE Silver Spring

Tastes great, but lacks punch...the taste is sweet mango and pepper spiciness with pine aftertaste. Very unique and tasty. However the high isn't strong enough for my pain and anxiety. I have to smoke a lot of this to help my medical conditions.”

“Ambitiously Awesome”
“I was really high last night when I smoked this. really high”

I have PPD (Paranoid Personality Disorder) and severe GAD, but for those hours, I was calmer and my ...”

“Girl Scout Cookies is one of those strains that lives up to its hype. I had this strain in the form of a beautiful, shiny amber-colored shatter. The taste was there but it was nothing extraordinary. The first time i tried this strain I wasnt satisfied because it just gave me a slight headbuzz. (Keep in mind that I was already high before trying the shatter.) I was expecting so much better. Then two days later, still ...”

“My new favorite strain. I got a quarter oz of it to try last week and loved it immediately. Went back and got 10 more grams. It’s a very mellow but noticeable headchange. Will continue to purchase this strain after a much needed tolerance break.”

“first time I ever had this I like it smells great and tastes great”

“Quality:
-dark in color

“i smoked this shit outta a bong, smoked a bowl and i was fucked already another bowl down and it was even better and then i went a took a few hoots from the pipe and this shit kills 10/10”
“Great functional high, euphoric without any anxiety.  I expected stronger munchies though.   Will use again.”

“My new favorite strain. Very positive and uplifting.  Can meld into music and all sensations enhanced in a very positive way. Very sticky bud even more than Gorilla Glue.  Can function well and sleep well. Great balance between sativa and indica. Perfect for me.”

“I give it two stars because it’s not working for me anymore.  This is the first strain I tried for my anxiety and at first it seemed to help. Not a whole lot but a little bit, it gave me my appetite back which I was really happy about.  After a few weeks it didn’t seem to help much and it made my anxiety a little worse so I’ve stopped using it.  Maybe in the future I’ll try it again and see if somethings changed”

“I bought this strain a couple of weeks ago. I just started smoking again (the last time I smoked was over 25 years ago) so my first time smoking again was with GSC's and I only had a few hits and I was good for the evening. Today when I smoked it I felt my migraine go away as soon as I was done smoking, I still only needed a few small hits to feel the benefits of the strain. After I was able to go back to my desk, co...”
“Amazing! Took a couple licks with my girl and made the most incredible love ever ;)”
“Munchies on top of munchies on top of munchies!!!! keep ya snacks close”
“Hard to go wrong with a Durban kid.  My GSC had a definite purplish exterior and a strong smell.  At around 20% THC it's mid to high level potency.  High was as advertised; euphoric and uplifting.”

“soft and sweet - while I am still in the beginning of my high, I'd like to say that HAD is a very soft creep up weed, and fogginess is naught. not gonna lie, not sure about the side effects, since I legit haven't finished. I just like the relaxation and sweet effects.”
“Heavy smoke. Takes a little time to adjust to the amount of smoke this bud produces. Overall, it's another Blue Dream" over-rated strain. So many growers are producing this flower
column4: I'll guess that not all buds are "true" GSC. It did get me relaxed with no unwanted side effects.”"

column3: “Ok so lmao😂😂 my first experience with gsc is my first time ever actually smoking don't know why I started with this strain but I did I swear I was so high I thought I dead in my dorm room bathroom and just started crying that's when I knew I got myself into some shit but all in all after that wore off I was extra relaxed and cool”
“Hard to go wrong with a Durban kid.  My GSC had a definite purplish exterior and a strong smell.  At around 20% THC it's mid to high level potency.  High was as advertised; euphoric and uplifting.”
