column3: “Ok so lmao😂😂 my first experience with gsc is my first time ever actually smoking don't know why I started with this strain but I did I swear I was so high I thought I dead in my dorm room bathroom and just started crying that's when I knew I got myself into some shit but all in all after that wore off I was extra relaxed and cool”
“Always a fan of the true cookies. Seems to be high quality whenever I see it which is a plus. Strong stone and Invigorating full body buzz.”
“Super sticky!”
“hybrid very tasty, equal parts head, and body high.”
“great all around”

“At the end of the high my vision became a little bit weird, but it was okay compared to when I eat edibles. 
I got this from a middle man so I thought he fooled me cause it didn't have a sweet smell or taste. I could taste some sweetness there but, most of it was earthy.
I really liked it though, it was a nice chill high, but also got me a little active.”
“Very good for body high, all around fire bud 🔥🔥🔥”
“best strain on the market. taste, smell, look and feel after smoking are amazing. experienced smokers only. this will kick your ass if you barely smoke.”
“oooohhhhhh My!”

“For the veteran? No, this is a sweet candy/baked taste lighter and more forgiving than most. Leaves you wanting more but definitely a 'got to try!' A big game changer for the 'new era' school of bud but can't keep up with the 'new school' faction”
“very tasty”

“Absolutely incredible. VERY strong so be careful! If you are a beginner, a little goes a long way. Absolutely love this strain. My body feels like I am getting a full body massage by a french masseuse and lightly floating on top of a cloud. Also, extremely uplifting and giggly. Would be awesome for hanging with friends or going to a social event! Smells great too. Gotta be one of the best strains I've ever tried. 10/...”
“Enjoying GSC right now. Holy crap I feel amazing. Great for back pain. New favorite strain I do believe.”

“Absolutely incredible. VERY strong so be careful! If you are a beginner, a little goes a long way. Absolutely love this strain. My body feels like I am getting a full body massage by a french masseuse and lightly floating on top of a cloud. Also, extremely uplifting and giggly. Would be awesome for hanging with friends or going to a social event! Smells great too. Gotta be one of the best strains I've ever tried. 10/...”
“Enjoying GSC right now. Holy crap I feel amazing. Great for back pain. New favorite strain I do believe.”
“great high, great taste, hard hitting, but did  cause anxiety and panic.”

“Wish I could do 3.5. Pretty good stuff and I was told what I bought wasn't the strongest from the harvest. Not a huge fan of the taste but that's an unpopular opinion so I wouldn't listen to me that much.”

“One of my all time favorite strains.
makes me happy, uplifted, and hungry :)”
“I really like this strain. I enjoy how calm it makes me. I'm always so happy and my depression and anxiety is controlled. It really helps me.”
“Definitely in my favorites”

“Nothing personal against this popular strain, but this bud does NOTHING for me. I don't feel high, relaxed, euphoric...nothing. I do get a achy body and head feeling, similar to he feeling after one smokes too much.  Have tried this strain from different dispensaries and the same result.  Also the same result if used as a parent strain in a new strain (Cookie Kush).”
“Nice active strain.  Keeps me up and mind open.”
“Really loved the fact when ever I would just sit down and smoke, it would give you a great relaxed feeling with a euphoric head high great weed!”
“this stain is one of my favorites for kick backs with friends”

“Gives me a nice body buzz/tingle along with the cerebral head high as well.  For me, I prefer to use this strain after work or anytime I'm trying to unwind late afternoon or evening.  It does hit my body hard after about an hour or so, so I typically like to be somewhere I can just be lazy or lounging.  Also makes me hungry af.”

“Easily one of my favorite strains. It's has great sweet hints and it leaves you with a really happy high. I have really bad anxiety and depression and it's always my biggest go to strain. I highly recommend this strain for someone with depression or anxiety. Hope this helps someone :)”

“Taste: 7/10 crisp, oddly refreshing
High: crisp is all I got”

“Don't know why it's not 'Girl Scout Cookies' anymore; I think it's got more of a ring than 'GSC.'

Anyways.

I smoke this strain every weekend with my buddies, excellent high. I've experienced an about 2/3 Head and 1/3 Body high. Pretty immobilizing stuff. Music is really enhanced- even white noise is interesting. 

If you sprinkle some kief into your bowls or joints, it becomes a real intense and an almost slightly ...”
“Amazing strain!! Love it and recommend it to all real smokers!”
“Deep Relaxation from indica but the sativa hits you subtly over time just drifting off into your own world and is the definition of getting u fried”
“My absolute favorite!!! Love the taste, the smell, the high; it's all such a perfectly well-made strain. If you're going to try smoking, this would be where I would start!”
“this is a great hybrid u get the best of both worlds with the Durban poison and og kush parents. this strain is potent and will give u couchlock”
“Amazing across the boards :) helps me sleep and relax in the evenings”
“what an amazing flower ! now I finally had GSC in my vape pen and wow, literally all I need is a hit or two and I'm gone. I'm an indica kinda guy but GSC is hands down my favorite strain around.”
“Great for women who are experiencing menstrual pain.”

“Very smooth and nice flavour. Limonene is apparent in the odour...which I really like.  Initial high mellows after an hour or so then I am able to focus on work or socialize. Helps my depression without causing jitters.”
“I really enjoyed the taste and smell. Worked great for pain and nausea. Also provided a feeling of happiness! Definitely one of the best.”

“This strain is everything everyone claims it to be! Very potent and psychoactive, a balanced hybrid. Extremely uplifting and energizing, great for daytime use. Doesn't help with falling asleep however I seem to get a very restful sleep with it, the best I've had in a very long time. Mixed with an indica  (I like Gorilla Glue #4 with it) it provides better overall pain relief while eliminating some of the heaviness of...”
“love me some gsc I'm going to have to stop by attis trading co. and get some today :-)”
“Smoked this strain with my boyfriend the other night. He spent the entire night crying in his car about his parents dying, who are both still alive and well. Other than that, great strain.”
“Easy to grow,  great  taste,   decent yield. A puff all day kinda strain.”
“Not too impressed. Didn't make me hungry, give me dry mouth, or make me tired.”
“smoked this when I was home alone and I was freaking out for what felt like an eternity but was 4 hours”

“I usually shy away from the Indica dominant strains, but this is one that I truly enjoyed. Fruity, earthy, chunky and sparkling. Such appealing and unique appearance to these nugs. I got mine at Moss Crossing in the Friendly Street area of Eugene, they grew it from seed.”

“Cerebral buzz. Colors looked vibrant and kept me elevated for 4-6 hours. Ears tingling, body felt light and couldn't help but enjoy myself immensely. If you're feeling down, this cookie may be for you.”
“It made me super paranoid.  Personally, it wasn't the best that I've had but, everyone is different.”
“Great for anyone who needs help eating”
“Super fun strain. I smoke this through a vape and find that it is always what I need at the end of the day to take the edge off! Body and mind feel great.”
“Smoked about 2 bowls and I'm feelin great could almost fall asleep ! Haha”

“The GSC is not one for the faint-of-heart (sweaty palms and nervousness) when on the journey of the Girl Scout. Going house to house. 
The Durban Poison is PROFUSELY understated in any review. I use in the morning when cleaning and planning the adult-life. Smoke is heavy, but fragrant and easy on the nose. Smells of crayons and little notes of febreeze. I. LOVE. THIS. STRAIN. Highly recommended for the one that needs...”
“Great for when you’re feeling low and want to get your day started. Gets you motivated and feel stress free. Focused on a task”
“Sweet and enjoyable”
“by far my favorite weed to smoke when I need a good uplifter. or if I need extra energy to just get it of bed”
“Very sticky, and also a throat burner... I love the taste and high it gives me. Makes me feel happy worth its money”
“Very pungent strain! really relaxed and giggly after only a couple hits. definitely in my top 3.”
“love it, but I would like a higher the level”
“Beautiful flowers. Smells sweet, just as the name implies.”
“Excellent strain for relaxation and pain relief. Great taste and burns slow and efficient”
“Dense small nugs but very potent.highly recommend.”
“Híbrida ideal para cualquier ocasión, relajado y feliz durante la duración de los efectos.”

“One of the best strains I've had in recent years. Very uplifting accompanied by high productivity/creativity and a general positive sense of awareness. A pungent smell with taste that follows, GSC is far and away my new favorite strain. I highly recommend for those looking for the best of both worlds. An uplifting hybrid that provides a warm fuzzy feeling while still allowing full functionality.”

“this strain is something different. like other reviews, I found that a couple hits of this strain from a bowl hits me hard and gets you above cloud 9. it had a whole different taste to it, a lighter and sweet flavor that I notice on exhale. like the leafly video I wouldn't recommend this to first timers but it's some great bud for sure. it seems to last a lot longer when I buy it as well”
“awesome bud that's all I got to say”
“I mean... What can u say... This is ridiculously good weed... It's a big buzz but man... This is the the shit.”
“Very yummy smooth great  smell looks great great feeling”

“Gsc is the ultimate time stopper when high off this‼️ You are the definition of calm and you may think your tired but your not, your just relaxed, strong hits so I advised to take baby hits if your new to gsc or smoking in general!”
“My absolute favorite strain, smells so good and you only need a little to do the job.”

“Some pungent lil nuggets of love. 
Light licorice/fennel and citrus smelling heavy OG with some unrivaled stickiness. Must be the OG dominant strain of GSC. There is a little bit of a salami or dried meat smell to these nugs too...Maybe because of all the oil in those thrichomes. 
When breaking up the dried and cured buds there's a lot of kief that coats your fingers and dusts the table. You would never guess there i...”

“Gsc is the ultimate time stopper when high off this‼️ You are the definition of calm and you may think your tired but your not, your just relaxed, strong hits so I advised to take baby hits if your new to gsc or smoking in general!”
“My absolute favorite strain, smells so good and you only need a little to do the job.”

When breaking up the dried and cured buds there's a lot of kief that coats your fingers and dusts the table. You would never guess there i...”

“One of my favorites to smoke :)
Fire product 100% on point.”
“it's amazing good”
“Such a good strain, quite strong, tastes fantastic.”

“Strain with lots of personality. Good pain relief, stress melting and mood boosting effects. Strong, though. Can be quite spacey/trippy. Definitely not something to give to people with very low tolerance. In my top ten, fighting for position with Blue Dream, which IMO has a similar kind of high.”

“I have been growing this strain for about 6 months and I tested it with mydx and it came in at 20.32% thc and was the highest in my garden at the time. all my patients almost crave it, and love how dense the buds are.”
“Bomb. Super eccentric high that lasts a long time. Can be either relaxing or using creativity, GSC rock”
“A personal favorite, it's given me more energy than green crack on occasion, if 4g + was used, but still somehow very relaxing. The good kind has a hint of chocolate in the smell”
“A good relaxing strain, but it makes you have the munchies bad”

“I'll give this 4 stars, because even though you can get a very well grown version of GSC that will knock you out, most of my experience has been subpar. The high would be a tad hazy and not focused but sometimes it's my favorite high. Until it's more consistent, I'll give it 4.”
“Great for euphoric effects but causes insomnia. Only good for morning.”
“Great strain! Not too overwhelming or anything. Perfect for late night when chillen.”
“One of my favorites, it helps my tremors and I don't smoke as much, like Cough2much says it gets me hypnotized everytime.”
“These buds have a unique smell and flavor profile to them. Very potent when grown right”

“I'll give this 4 stars, because even though you can get a very well grown version of GSC that will knock you out, most of my experience has been subpar. The high would be a tad hazy and not focused but sometimes it's my favorite high. Until it's more consistent, I'll give it 4.”
“Great for euphoric effects but causes insomnia. Only good for morning.”
“Great strain! Not too overwhelming or anything. Perfect for late night when chillen.”
“One of my favorites, it helps my tremors and I don't smoke as much, like Cough2much says it gets me hypnotized everytime.”

“The strain that has been hyped so much in the past years, that right now it is very hard to find the original. I had the chance to have Jiggas and Berners cut straight from Cookie Fam, and I was impressed. Apart from that, I would recomend checking on the genealogy/strain/cut or pheno that your dispencary provides. Hands dow to CookiesSF and Jungle Boys, if you catch their drop then go for it!”
“love it!!!!! im medicated !!!!”
“Strong munchies”
“It tastes sweet, like a cookie, suits its name. The high is a nice happy high. Keeps you on task and uplifted. Grate for school and getting work done.”
“Very soft, not dry, and it grinds really well. Solid top 5 for me”

“I tried it a few times just to make sure I don't like it. I definitely don't like it. So weird because I've smoked weed with equal or higher THC and there is just something about this one that brings out some weird dark depressing and anxious thoughts no matter how happy, comfortable, and content I am before smoking it. The high is pretty much only okay if I'm drunk first before I smoke it up. I had a little over a q...”
“Keep munchies close”
“I love it. I was high as hell after just my first hit. Definitely my favorite strain.”
“over all a great product ...”
“This shits got me dancing to music”

“Look, if you like uppy, active, creative sativa highs, this is going to be your JAM. I love this strain. My parter can’t stand it, though- it makes him feel anxious. So know your pot and yourself, is what I mean, I guess.

A real classic, an easy smoke- I like this for when I sit down to paint.”
“I love this strain. It is one of the best strains to help my fiance with her pain,anxiety and stress.”

“One of my all time faves! This strain wins me over every time I get to experience it. This time around, the THC was at 25.31% with CBD of 0.53%. So tasty! I prefer to stay awake and do stuff with GSC.”
“This is a personal favorite of mine. Very little paranoia and a strong euphoric feel at the peak. Definitely a good day or night smoke”

“Great strain for depression and other major medical disabilities. Helps with pain and sleeping problems. Not to mention the high. If this doesn't get you high, either you're not toking it, or it's not Girl Scout.”

But then again, I also think that some strains work better on a bong but for me this is a strain that works better in a joint of blunt. I do like the rich and strong flavor it gives though, it makes GSC really stand out.”

“Good strain, made me feel good after about 2 bowls, it's pretty fire :) although it was more of a body high for me.”
“great strain its has a very fruity smell and the after taste of cookies help more with pain because it puts you in a really relaxed high”

“hey so I know this strain is super popular but be aware it is not for everyone! I started smoking this about 3 (2? )years ago when I was living in LA and it had just come out. It was fun for a head high of about 20 min, but was nothing too great, and was generally shocked to find it back so high on the charts. Maybe its good for hybrids, but be aware it's not neccisarily a queen! crazy its so popular.. i've been livi...”

“I use GSC for my back pain and headaches. For some reason, GSC and Purple Train-wreck make it hard for me to build sentences, or to talk. I otherwise am clear headed and pain free. I do eat a lot after vaping...”
“Holy shit. First: This is sweet. Extremely sweet in paper or bong. Second: This is a one-and-done flower. Heavy cottonmouth, heavy munchies. Would buy again.”
“tastes great good lung expansion terpene profile is fantastic this is a impressive flower”
“Makes me wanna EAT COOKIES. O would highly recommended.”

“Solid strain to chill out with but the indica aspects hit hard and fast. Less of a head high and more of a body high, which is nice at the right times, but I think this strain is overrated--but hey, it gets the job done.”
“It’s pretty nice had some bouts of anxiety when it really kicked in but as you got used to it the anxiety faded and just relaxation”
“its delicious, heady and strong.”
“Strong citrus and pine terpenes give this strain a unique smell. Playful relaxing high. Intense body buzz and immune system activation for medical patients.”
“Sweet burnt cookie taste and plenty of punch.”
“on the short list. good strain for my stuff”
“Very good for pain control and insomonia. Very relaxing and doesn’t get me paranoid at all.”

“Honestly, I'm usually a sativa/indica guy because they generally seem to have pretty consistent results with my body. I branched out last week and decided to try some hybrids that come highly recommended on Leafly and GSC was one. 

Overall, the the impression was that it was kind of one dimensional. I didn't feel bad...or good...or too relaxed...or creative. I just kind of felt high" and like "OK
column4: well
column5: it's cannab...”"

column3: “I fuck wit this strain all day. Smoked a few oz’s of this. Dense. Great shit tho”
“Smoked some of this, then ate 3 whole pizzas with my eyes closed before falling asleep for 16 hours”
“esta chingona compa”

“For some reason this strain gives me more anxiety.”
“pretty good high but the taste was way too strong for me.”
“For some reason this strain gives me more anxiety.”
“pretty good high but the taste was way too strong for me.”
“my favorite”

“That is exactly what I'm having, must say, it does it's work! feel euphoric (on the funny side of course and then you get this drop for about 20
minutes, and back on the saddle, you ride your mind. This hybride should be re-evaluated and be useful to people with high anxiety"
column4: instead of that chemical shit that is sold only to make the entreprises richer!!”"

column3: “Excellent strain. I hadn't eaten in a few days due to nausea but a couple bong rips from GSC, and the nausea was gone. Also, great for my anxiety disorder and insomnia. It tastes great, potent, but lovely w no paranoia side effects. One of my top 10.”
“it makes me feel so relaxed man, this strain is the best.”
“By far my favorite strain from the west coast. Great taste, and it was an awesome high.”
“awesome! !!! enough said!...must try!”
“awesome”
“Dank and delicious! Never had this cross before and I really enjoy it. Great for the day and cannot be beat for breakfast!”
“GSC was pretty smooth and the buds had nice features nice and frosty with purple undertones nice for the bong”
“this strain is so good. I have anxiety and didnt feel much.”

“Got an eigth of this treat from Terpene station. Wow is all I can say. This Berner cut really brings out the full potential of GSC. Lovely creamy earthy nose with s taste that carries through. Euphoric and cerebral high that is a great mood elevator.”

“Noticed sweet caramel, earthy, pungent, apple, chocolate and mint smells. However the taste is more on the vanilla sugar cookie side. Immediate body high coupled with mental relaxation. A real breakthrough stress / pain medication. Helped me with creativity and kept me quite happy for the duration. Found that this strain is best smoked in a joint for taste. Very smooth, but potent smoke.”

“Very relaxing, creative euphoria, zoning out, smoked a ripper off the bong, definitely one of my favorite strands because it's keeps you up! My brain feels heavy from the potency! Thank you God for this awesome strand!”
“It’s cool, not “sweet” the way I expected”

“Very relaxing, creative euphoria, zoning out, smoked a ripper off the bong, definitely one of my favorite strands because it's keeps you up! My brain feels heavy from the potency! Thank you God for this awesome strand!”
“It’s cool, not “sweet” the way I expected”

“Today is Saturday March 14 Girl Scout cookies my girlfriend love this string.. So do I we I revived it and got it to my car 3mins later the smell was loud...lol  I spark the blunt...... Sweet and shady of its kush parent it is very potent and not overly intense as I like it but she love it a kinda pine taste very sweet kinda dense, love the after taste kinda taste like cookies maybe the coconut chocolate ones....... ...”
“very uplifting high great when I'm feeling kinda sluggish and need a pick-me-up”

“WARNING. All GSC's aren't created equal (but they are all good af!)... however they all will MAKE GREAT SEX... and make GREAT SEX feel as comfortable and manageable as masturbation ...YET incredibly intense

Aside from sexual effects........... it makes you want to have mutually passionate and selfless sex ...and or masturbate....

ok ok ..the DP provides a mental clarity that is not to be mistaken with sobriety that...”
“Mmmmmm thin mints🔥”
“I have had a few good batches of this stuff. I got very productive on this stuff. Just a small amount will get your anxiety a break”
“Very dense bud!”

“This strain is out of this world  nice tight buds good taste and great smell   it says it’s up to 28% thc I think it’s more thank you cheap bud Canada for bringing in the good weed I’ll refer everyone to check this out”
“Favorite strain... only because I couldn’t find Gorilla Glue #4”
“Full body relaxation, euphoria, contentment”

“This strain really worked out for me with anxiety, and just stress in general. Great strain, i don't recommend it to new smokers tho. Its pretty damn potent, and she will have you floatin on cloud 9.”
“this weed is some of the strongest smelling bud ive ever had like i only bought an 8th and it had my entire apartment smelling like a garden”

“Wow! Great to knock out pain. Great happy, euphoria surge, natural pain killer and anti depressant! It had a hint of mint - very clean taste. Definitely a go to for productivity - tasks - social settings (made me very chatty) day time type !”
“Have only tried the pen taste terrible. Don't know why.The high is relaxing. Will try the flower next time for sure.”
“One Of My Favorites. Never Can Go Wrong With Cookies”
“One Of My Favorites. Never Can Go Wrong With Cookies”

“Amazing strain, whenever I buy I get this, I was in a very bad accident causing me to have a form of PTSD. This helps me cope with back pains, stress and it really helps with ADHD. this is one of the finest”

“I love Girl Scout Cookies. They do occasionally give me a headache, thus the 4 stars. This strain makes me feel instantly relaxed and in flow. Slightly aroused and somewhat hungry, I can feel the high in the front of my upper head, towards my eyes. GSC is great and I definitely suggest it, however they do cause headache if I smoke too much or smoke it when I'm tired. Keeps me relaxed and focused.”
“very relaxed!”
“Vaped It the first time I tried this. Love the slight mint finish. My arthritis melted away. Wonderful pain relief. Restful sleep when all was said and done.”
“this is a forget to take another hit type goods.  super stoney couch lock goodness.  space flight and happy thoughts.  Personal top 5 ever.”

“Some of the best cannabis I've had in a while. Very smooth to smoke. Very effective after 1 or 2 hits. Last a couple of hours.  Very easy relaxed feeling afterwards. Can't wait try some oil or vap this strain.”

“Its Amazing, if you feel bad, sad or just angry you should burn something, I recommend this strain, when I feel like this, I smoke some Cookies and I feel much better, cookie transform your negative energy to positive energy, its a damn good sativa. Regards From Chile.”

“Very sweet taste and air on the exhale. Did wonders for my back pain. Unfortunately I'm still looking for something to help me sleep but this strain will be put on the voting list this round as a possibility.”

“love it give me a really deep high of very little i very impressed my fav right now”

I got high for 4 hours and made me look for real cookies (munchieees!).  I can say that the GSC is a great recreational kind of strain cuz everyone would enjoy the very relaxed and euphoric high and the sweet taste of the...”
“All around great strain... Love it in concentrate”

“Light green with a few orange hairs. It has a ton of crystals, almost looks frosted or dusted with diamonds. Medium dryness. It hits hard but smooth with an earthy aftertaste. It definitely didn’t disappoint (my first time smoking this strain) but it’s not my favorite.”

“Fantastic! This strain knocks nausea on it's ass! Overall great strain though, good for those with stress, a few tokes on this will make you forget about all of your worries... Unfortunately it also makes you forget about household chores!”
“This strain was not bad, but I do not feel it lives up to the hype.”

go round in silly circles like the runoff groove at the end of Sergeant Pepper a time or two.

column2: you will feel the typical buzz along with body relaxation. I was giggly for a bit

“I’m a 60 yo chronic pain suffer. I take long acting morphine and tramadol. This strain has some serious side effects if smoke a little too much: nausea, vomiting, dizziness, cold sweats, vision problems, pounding fast heart rate. Be careful, strong strain!”

“Run of the mill balanced strain. People stand behind this strain like it’s the end all be all of bud. At this point this is in the fast food category of bud. “I am a lightweight when it comes to smoking so the higher I can get with the least amount of weed, the better. And this strain definitely delivers.

One of those benefits is the time-warping effect I've come to love from high powered indicas. It expresses it's sativa genes through a calm and clear mind, perfect for relieving stress...”

“I love the aroma, the taste while smoking is pretty mild and it has a pleasant after taste as well. column3: “Ya know...I gots to be loving love me some og n durban...gotta loves me some:~  #GsC as well my friend. Tastes so lovely, like the smell... n greaaat high u can really concentrate n focus on it.. Or really fukin space it let me tell you hahaha..happens to me alllll the time...GSC!”

“This is a wonderful daytime strain that keeps you going and happy. The subtle body high with a cerebral experience as well proves this strain's popularity to be legit. I wouldn't recommend at night, I got quite paranoid of supernatural feelings. And I don't even believe in that shit.”

“Great Flavor, It's very Tasty and also Very crystallized and beautiful, GSC are one of my favorite hybrids. Gives you a nice high and goes good with some nice Hash maybe with some good dabs on top of the bowl too.”

“first time smoking it and......WOW
 one of the cleanest highs ever...”

“I love it the smell the pungency    
I tend to dose off in deep thought after taking a few drags. Very good strain love this hybrid !!”
“one big bowl with a 15 second hold had me dumb high”

“Great day use is has a uplifting feeling but if you have 
pain it can lock you down too. Love this one. My new go to for both.”
“LOVED!  Nice over-all effect and a lovely flavor.  Definitely all the strain for your sign" (scorpio) promised ;)

column1: I love that SoCalPURE always has the best selection of quality flavors!  Fresh and -tasty-!”"

column3: “nerve calmer”

“A darker bud with lots of orange hairs. I thought it actually tasted like peanut butter girl scout cookies, but also made my mouth dry like them. Great for the cold weather, makes you want to curl up for the day.”

“Nice steady non drowsy high, great sweet taste with a herbal smell.
It's rude, yet not offensive high brought me up.”
“One of my favorites..LOVE IT!”
“My favorite at the moment”
“i was never that into weed until i bought my first ounce of gsc, ever since then I've been a thc monk for life”

“This is a very nice strain. One of the best THC strains I have had in a while. Dense, green and white colored buds. Wonderfully sweet smell. I smoked with a glass pipe and it was very enjoyable, not too harsh. One hit at 6pm, let that settle in, then another at 8. Very controllable effects with micro-dosing. The effect was happy, content and relaxed. It took away pain and anxiety. Then I slept like a baby.”
“I really enjoyed this”
“Hands down my favorite strain.”

“Heard about this one forever and finally got a chance to try it. Really good and reliable strain, well suited for any occasion—daytime or night. It's powerful, so be careful of potential anxiety. You need to remember to stay focused, and let the strength drive you toward zen, instead of indulging in everyday worries.”
“first time I ever had this I like it smells great and tastes great”
“The flavors from this strain are what makes it stand out- Its a very distinctive cookies flavor. its uplifting, energetic and not a stoney couch lock feeling making it great for daytime.”
“one of my faves. euphoria and relaxation fades into a nice mellow buzz. perfect to smoke after a long day at work when i still have shit to do.”

“By far, one of my favorite strains of all time. The smell is just beautiful, and the smoke is so smooth and it hits just right. i packed a bowl of this, and it looked amazing. love this. cures my nausea 👍🏽”

“lives up to its hype, beautiful looking buds.  taste for me was a like a lemon sugar cookie and wood.  pretty tasty.  high is super chill, no racing brain, just relax/focus mode.  I used it playing golf with some friends and was just that..focus'd/relaxed.  Great strain, cant wait to get more.”
“the cookies”
“Try the veganic form”
“Listen, I smoked this around 6pm yesterday. Went to work at midnight, got off at 8am. And I'm STILL high! Yeezus! Strongest strain I've smoke since white widow”
“Very clear headed high and great for relieving stress. Not a real couch locked effect which is good but its just as nice to lay down. Listen to some Bob Marley on this one!”

“The first time I tried GSC I was very skeptical about it. But after the second time I fell in love with this strain. It gave me the feeling of loating through waves. Highly recommend this, although not for novices. My brother is a novice and he was pretty paranoic when he tried it. So newcomers be wary.”
“Excellent. Very strong indica”

“GSC is a strain that's great for daytime use. Powerful. I love the smell and taste of it. It doesn't knock me out right away but I get somewhat sleepy when the effects start coming down. I'd go easy with it.”
“One of my favorites :)”
“kind of like - landing on the moon and finding space rocks - extremely dense - happy stress relief.”

“nice easy hybrid, as someone who gets panic attacks I have to be careful with hybrids but this one gave me energy and motivation while still feeling relaxed and comfortable! not anxiety inducing at all I was not sleepy but felt the body relaxation immediately.”
“Always a go to smoke if it's available. GSC never lets you down.”
“If you are looking for the ultimate bud, this is it, top notch! cant finish a joint because of the resin build up, exceptional buzz.”
“The best bud I've had in years for sure my top recommendation”
“They are who we thought they were!!" -some football coach”"
“I was really high last night when I smoked this. really high”
“Ambitiously Awesome”
“Such an uplifting feeling honestly.”

“Girl Scout has gotten so popular that people have actually started selling other strains under the name. It's the type of weed that will knock you on your ass or have you roaming the streets for hours only to find out your house is right next door. However, it has to be right. I've ran into some places that have sold me clearly what is not the same GSC I've had before.”

“Picked up this strain last week and I've had a number of opportunities to use it to relieve my head pain thanks to our weather in the PNW. Each time it has been great for both lifting the pain and helping me get moving and actually having a great rest of my day. Picked it up at HypeHerbAlly in Everett.”
“good shit”
“definitely not a favorite”
“Love this strain! Such a great high, and packed full of medicine! So many fake cookie strains out there, so be sure you trust your source! I recommend this for any smoker/ patient!!!”
“the feeling of the bud is relaxing and a smooth high”
“Gave me crazy anxiety every couple times I smoked. Did not enjoy.”
“Happy and very laughy😂”

“bomb fire checkout our review video on youtube check out our gsc strain review thanks! #respect  
http://youtu.be/nkTvpgag9Aw?list=UUxdRenmQ8MoVvjGknErxRwA”
“I must say smoking GSC is very head banging to me . I love the earthy smell to it it gives it that kick . I smoke with Grabba so adding that to the GSC was amazingly bless.”
“I love Girl Scout Cookies! Taste fabulous but could be a little more potent in my opinion.”
“Nice and balanced”
“Fabulous! Shiva SHANTI is what I love about J1; not Shiva Skunk!”

“Amazing.....

I saw a video of Snoop smoking this strain, and wanted to try it. It did not disappoint in the slightest.

Thx Snoop!”
“My all time favorite. Never disappointed!  Always has a nice flavor & a hint of lemon to the smell.”
“gotta love the sweet earthy taste.”
“Yesterday I tried and was normal not bad not good”

“After getting past the sketchy name, I found there is a reason that it is so popular - it is an uncommonly balanced blend of cerebral stimulation and body bliss.

I also find it lasts a long time and tapers off ever so gently.

Enough of this and you begin to move into mild psychedelic territory, which is fantastic if you are expecting it or know how to handle it.

Due to the balance, I feel I can either be active or...”
“finally got my hands on this strain, it was worth the wait I'm smoking as I write this(never waste sweet thc) 5/5 LOVE ME SOME KK”

“In a word, mediocre. There's lots of hype around this strain but with little reason from my experience. Its dull appearance is more telling of its effects- Dark, almost brown, hairs (and many of them), a medium degree of trichomes, a subtle smell, and a moss-like color. It gives a mild body buzz when smoked with sedating effects (calm, relaxed, sleepy). Perhaps a better use of this strain would be in infusions, oils,...”

“first time trying these delicious cookies today and man, they taste sooo good, taste just like some good girl scout cookies.

😋🍪
💨😌👌”

“People just dont get the right batch of GSC. This strain is mainstream for a reason, it is strong, its sativa side is way creepier than trainwreck, abusive og or BTY og, it smash fast and hard. The indica side wasnt really show up much except for the tingling feeling you get while on it. 
If you oversmoke this, you'll get paranoid for sure. They shoulda named this strain Darth Vader" tho
column4: it holds a very wicked high...”"

column3: “a great smoke”
“Fire. Gives you a great high.”
“man i love me some girl scouts. oh and their cookies. im in heaven right now hahaha”
“Really nice smoke! Has me gettin some work and chores done.”
“Waited forever to try this one and it was worth it.”
“tastes a little gas like to me and makes me all tingly but loses one star due to setting my paranoia super high”
“Always awesome.  ns”

“Great blend of sativa and indica. I would like to say leans heavier to the indica side. Great for later afternoon activity or light daytime activities with light use of motor skills. Cerebral euphoria is almost instant. Mellow draw smooth on the throat. A good strain for anytime of day.”
“I honestly felt like I was superman when I smoked this strain. The high gives a very positive energy and will motivate you to do anything. Highly recommend this [No pun intended].”

“This strain is top-notch if grown right . Great pain reliever have you feeling the effects after two hits. Good heavy lifted high u could never go wrong with this strain . Taste sweet and smooth one of the best!!”
“good full body high that relaxes.”
“Great heady creative strain. Perfect for expanding your musical horizons”
“This is great great bud.....I vape it and it is awesome.   Very talkative and enhances music....it's party herb...makes me wanna sing makes me wanna dance🦄🗿🐋🛩🐢🚀.  Five stars from me.”
“great stuff. perfect for music festivals. great fuzzy high :DD”
“Definitely the most medicinal strain I've had. Great for anxiety. One of my favorites.”

“I'm not usually an indica lover, but this hybrid is really good for kicking my sciatic nerve pain. I love the all over body buzz, and the semi clear head but still energized enough to be productive. I love vaping this strain!!”
“Well balanced good for day time pain relief.”
“My #3 favorite hybrid. If you get a chance to try don't pass it up.This will help the pain and PTSD.”
“Euphoric high, super giggly, super hungry, great body buzz with little to no dry mouth.  The times I've smoked this strain they've been super potent too.”

“only helped me out a few times for my rsd, if you're stressed out or have horrible muscle spasms it will make you shake. not really good for the relaxing part for this one. I have a implant and this strain makes you feel the wires and battery in your body which was odd. but the muscle spasms got me the most. I really wanted this one to help out”
“A positive experience. Happy, uplifting and inviting strain profile.”
“Received a sample from a grower and was very impressed.  Loved the body high and feeling warm, happy and at ease.  All while still be able to mentally function.  Adding this to my favorites list.”

“Got my first delivery of the strain a couple days ago, instead of hitting it and writing a review thought I would give it a few days and then comment. I suffer from constant headaches and anxiety, and it eliminated both in short order. I find it can be a bit harsh on the exhale, but will buy this again.”
“very mellow, not overly strong”
“I Was Happy But My Head Hurts After I'm Done Testing But For Most Part I Was very Happy And Hungry”
“BOmbtastick!  as of 11.11.16 lots left :)”

“Stepped away from GSC for a bit as it was EVERYWHERE but I went back to this medical marvel since I was having some stomach pain and it always works to ease my appetite issues and also is one of the best strains for pain management. 🌵”
“Very nice kush smelling and tasting strain.. High medical grade for pain , depression and anxiety. Would definitely purchase this strain again.”
“Very smooth smoke. Burns nice and slow. I feel like this strain is more sativa dominant.”
“I find myself smoking this strain the most. Its not by chance either, it not only hits very nicely its very beautiful bud. Its not too complex and is my go to classic will get you stoned bud.”
“Best strain I have ever smoke”
“My sister has a blast with this strain but it just leaves me feeling tired,confused and forgetfull.”
“Excellent go-to hybrid. Sedating yet, very heady. Pretty good all purpose strain. Very giggly, goofy high. You can't go wrong with a well grown GSC. Very potent!”

“girl scout cookies is awesome. we hit it just now and feel sooooo good.

floaty, tingly, happy, with misty vision and an early-mushroom-high feeling.

causes cottonmouth, amorousness, and bad grammar.”
“One of the best strains ive ever smoked. Mixed this with bruce banner #3, as well as gg4.”
“Great for yoga and conscious breathwork”
“This is a great strain. Doesn't make you too tired, but also mellows you out. It's one of my favorites.”

“Beware this is definitely a hard hitting strain. The high is more focused in the head but the body high is also there. I also feel myself very relaxed and it made me more tired in the morning. I wasnt tired then it made me tired.”
“The hybrid version of this strain is much sweeter and easier to smoke than the sativa-dominant version.”
“I think I heard the hype before trying it, so I was expecting a different high. To my pleasant surprise this strain left me feeling energetic and creative!”
“More comfortable for outside of work. Perfect feeling for doing yoga! Heavy and Happy”

“One of my top 5 strains!

The smell, the chillness, the smooth smoke and after smell that lingers--- all the ingredients as to why I ❤️ this strain. 

Negative: the munchies from hell.”
“Easily one of the best strains I've ever had.  What's not to love about a very potent perfectly balanced hybrid?”
“always a treat. absolutely love the super sweet smell and its one of the best tasting strains in exsistence. excellent well rounded hybrid great anytime of day”

“gsc one of my favorites, always a treat when I bring home this strain from it's dense nuggs to the strong sweet stinch the high will leave you wondering around a park or If your like me a grocery store just for no reason.. smoke up and enjoy friends.”
“This shit's kill yo. I picked up a Half O of this stuff and man it's like... so good! i love it! such a chill high and it so good so max and relax off of.”

“I LOVE THIS STRAIN!!!!!! I had been off weed for a few months because of school and work, so I didn't have time to sit down and enjoy any flower. I bought some Girl Scout Cookies for the first time and I instantly fell in love with it.”
“Very headed danky knock you socks off made me hungry would get again”

“This strain is beautiful and delicious and holy shit it is just flat out amazing. the first time I smoked it I was in love immediately. my friends told me to be careful with it because it doesn't hit you right away and it's so sweet that you want to keep on smoking it. and boy were they right it smells and looks just as it tastes sugary and sweet fruity Piney with a little hint of diesel when I smoked it immediately ...”
“I had one big pipe T and was instantly transferred to a world of mellow relaxation. One of the best strains I have ever smoked.”

“This flower has a sweet, slightly earthy smell and initial taste. It goes down smooth, but the effects aren't as subtle as I'm used to when they come on. 

I didn't feel the super, energetic euphoria that others have, but it did bring about a nice, pleasant feeling. 

It didn't work as well on pain as the indica-heavy strains I usually use, but it did get the job done.”
“best shit i ever had”
“Absolutely amazing strain (depending on the batch) Great for relieving anxiety. Throw on some Pink Floyd and go for a ride.”
“Great strain, gets the job done every time.  Nice calming feel and relaxation, great strain for doing stuff!  It sometimes gives me some dizziness though but i don't care lol.”
“Amazing!”

“My first experience with this strain was a mindblower. A quick working medicine that hits you right between the eyes. This has to be top of the line in anyones book. It worked very well for.my back pain. Great relief”

“I was just introduced to this strain today, and I am very impressed. With my recent higher tolerance, this was a real nice treat. Felt very uplifted and my anxiety virtually disappears, so I can be more productive instead of sulking about. Definite 9, great recommendation for everyday users.”

“finally was able to cop some BOMB girl scout cookie in the inland empire[: luckily the clinic i go to has them at all their spots, rancho healing center UHG & glendora healing center. It leaves a long lingering delicious taste in your mouth also you only need a bowl and it will knock out all your medicinal needs. a definite must-try! i'ma pick up a lot before its all out! thanks RHC [ :”
“Tasty, hints on lemongrass, mint, diesel and purple. Long lasting high and nice comedown. Good for trips to the Bay Area and for driving around.”

“Verrrrry nice!  Has a sweet, lemony taste, very much reminiscent of the cookies it was named for, and a strong but pleasant smell.  The high itself was long-lasting, well over 90 minutes for me, and was pleasant, with no negative thoughts or feelings.  Gives me quite the appetite, so this might be a useful strain for those needing a boost in that area.  Excellent for relief of menstrual cramping/irratibility, too.”
“Great for sleeping. Even just shake.”

“This stuff was fantastic. 
Felt a little paranoid, but the effects itself were great. I'd recommend this to anyone, the taste, aroma, and impact were just brilliant. I have to say, my eyes did get very red and stayed that way for a long time, I ended up saying I had pollen allergies (even though I've never had them in my life) and had to fake sniffling and sneezing for the next 2 days as a result. But I guess that's...”
“Favorite strain by far.”
“Is so perfect for flares when the pain is really bad”
“This was the best Girl Scout Cookie I have ever had. Perfectly smooth and relaxing. This place made the strain the right way.”
“Relaxing, uplifting high. Smells sweet like cherry or cotton candy.”
“Delicious. Put me right to bed.”
“One of the best I've tried. Giggles. Happy. Awesome strain”

“Girl Scout is In my top ten favorite strains of all time. I could never get tired of this strain and its benefits! Relaxing with a great cerebral high, Sweet Earthly flavor, & Grows beautifully. I love everything about this strain! The thin mint Pheno is where its at. ;)”

“Very upbeat. Made me super happy and energetic. Provided some good conversation. Smelled like sweet tea. Super thick nugs. Inspired me to get a new grinder. Best to smoke before bdubs. Thank you jesus. Amen.”
“So tasty.”

“great top shelf with a very beautiful smell. gets a good conversation started.
definitely one of my favorites”

“This stuff is pretty strong and relieves anxiety almost immediately for me. If i have any pain then that's gone as well. Only issue is that i don't like being around people after smoking it. Also helps with insomnia if you have issues with that.”
“by far my favorite strain. beautiful color and smell.”

“Got myself a 8th from the green door in sf. The bag appeal was awesome 10/10. The smoke i would have to give it a 5/10.honestly i like more of a up high and this is not it..but no doubt a strong strain . A must try regardless !!”
“One of the strains in my rotation. Awesome tunnel vision , numbing effects from this bud. I use it to get throwed more than to socialize which this bud is also great for.”

“it's ok very well Mr. Pancho.”
“My buddies and I gave this strain a try for the first time and I can say with certainty that it lives up to its reputation. A very nice overall high and a few pizzas were sacrificed to the lord THC”
“I've smoked this strain multiple times and it's one of my favorites. you feel a real relaxed and go with the flow type high.”
“Excellent for sore muscles and aching joints, such a body high.”
“Really strong cannabis.”
“I love smoking this”
“Tastes and smells sweet. The intensity of the high for me was determined by what mood I was in. Had heavily increased appetite.”
“Just smoked 1 1/2 bowls. Super relaxed and chilled out.. Almost trance like. Definitely in my top 3 strains.”
“I love this strain so fucking much aah cerebral high and like not lazy but still euphoric and uplifted I just want to eat my fridge and conquer my GPA”
“Endless Happiness!”
“This strain is one of the BEST, SMOOTHEST bud I have ever smoked”
“Favorite strain to use”

“Great strain. Definitely makes one feel euphoric and at ease. If you're having a stressful day, definitely cool off with GSC. Even a whiff of this bud will relax you with its earthy yet sweet like candy scent. But beware, you'll end the high with a mean case of the munchies. Almost uncontrollable.”
“This is one of my top 10 strains, mostly because of the very energetic yet relaxed the body feels. Personally it is a good strain for the whole day,( morning, afternoon, night).”
“This is truly an ideal hybrid, body high from the Indica and head high from the sativa works very well in the morning or afternoon. I will be having this again.”
“Excellent always potent it puts you down immediately if you have any sleep issues or anxiety this is the strain no question.”

“Had my first taste of GSC yesterday... Yowza! Its all sweet, delicious, rich kushy aromas with an underlying hint of baked goods. Super strong, it makes me feel like a god with sometimes as little as one hit. Very relaxing but not lethargy inducing. And the flavor it imparts to cannaoil when making savory edibles is just perfect... Try it on pasta, folks.”

“I love it, from it's sweet smell to it's wonderful clean flavor. It got my mind working clear as a bell. It is very uplifting, great for my depression, and relieved some of my spinal pain. Over all I am glad to have it and I will be enjoying this strain again. Jah Bless”
“Favorite!”

“enjoyable & relaxing from the first bowl hit. anxiety? completely removed.....body high is soothing . good 'chillin' strain. very easy to recognize upon smoking.... like a 'first time' type feeling..... but you get it every time its smoked.”

Sincerely,
Reuben Altamirano
(poop ca ca)”

“(Grower Grade - A) Organic

Here we go again... Another flower that everyone raves about and I didn't think it lived up to the hype. Don't get me wrong GSC is still a dope strain but just couldn't hang with me... The taste, the high, etc... Very disappointed. Give it a try for yourself, you might love it”
“One of my favorites for sure”
“10/10 when I smoked this only a few hits in and man oh man. Driving down the road I felt like I was on a rollar coaster. My stomach was all over the place. By far my favorite.”

“medical girl scouts is where it's at, blown away! 11/10 would smoke every day”
“Usually depends on the batch or grower great for video games!”

“My first time ever smoking and it was this strain & i didn't cough at all. i was just really happy and everything was funny. i also felt like i could walk forever, i wasnt tired but my body was tingling lol I didn't get anxious or paranoid at all. same with appetite I wasn't hungry at all seriously actually food tasted gross, but my friend ate all the food we brought. Its the next day now and i have a headache still ...”
“Wonderful Strain”

“Pretty much a classic now or on its way to being one. I mean hasn't everybody atleast heard of this strain, and if grown well I've never had nor heard of any complaints. The flavor is awesome you can really see where it gets it's name, and the high a masterpiece. It's one of those strains that if you go into a shop and they have this one it's gonna be good. Nothing bad to say definitely one that will be on my go to s...”

“I began a love affair with this strain when I first tried it last summer in San Francisco while tripping on mushrooms in the Haight lol. Since then I have taken every chance I've gotten to indulge in some cookies. I prefer Platinum over Thin Mints but either will do!”

“Nice relaxing high, upbeat and happy. Good all around.”

“Very strong. I got very high on a small amount. Some buds were very strong while others pretty weak. Helped a little with my lower back pain. Didn't make me sleepy which was nice. The only thing i didn't like was the super strong skunky smell and weird taste.”
“ESTA SEPA ES TOTALMENTE RECOMENDABLE .... PARA MI AH SIDO TODO UN ÉXITO EN UN CULTIVO INDOOR”

“Quickly becoming one of my favorites. Medicinally great for sleep. Smells great; pungent- contact high from smelling it.  Aphrodisiac, amirite??? Not for use during the day if yer a 9-5 kind of person.”

“it slight twangs of cranberry I was met by a strong celebrial full body high soon after consuming the product”
“Very aromatic  nice heavy body high held anxiety depression and is very sweet and flavorful”

“bomb as fuck. supposedly its Cherry Pie cross-stabalized back with durban poison. i have never felt so lazy in my entire life. very sweet but raspy taste on the exhale, definitely can feel the durban. once i was done coughing i could taste the cherrypie undertones. definitely in my top 3”

“Girl Scout Cookies extract by GoldenXrtX is a great product. The hit tastes just like the bud. Its has a mellow high but not energy draining. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is the 52%THC level, which is still quite high.”
“A sneaky strain with a sneaky high. I have an obscenely low tolerance for THC, OTC and bus seat fabrics. I smoked this and said to myself You
column4: my friend
column5: are high as sh!t. yep." I was well aware that I was high
column6: but wasn't concerned by this. A feeling of total "Fugit" washed over me

column2: and that's just fine for me. I was using this to treat a migraine

“This Strain Is Perfect For me ...  Helps my anxiety a lot”
“GSC does what it advertises!  Hard to describe this high... But I really dig it.  Happy and heady.. Just kinda perfect.”

“I absolutely love this strain. My husband and I tried it due to our friend from Cali. My husband (who is a very experienced with mariguana) enjoys smoking it coming home from work the most. Relaxing and gives the best munchies. This strain overall is one...”
“one of my faves”

“fire all day one of my faves hands down”

“GSC is one of my top 5 favorite strains, and what I refer to as my reliable strain when I can't get what I'm looking for or need a good strong strain to help feel better. THC levels are excellent, with relief following shortly after smoking. definitely would recommend as an all around good quality mmj.  GSC kief (col...”

tastes smooth and really just makes you chill.
If you haven't grabbed some, 
leafly has a great dispensary map ;P”

column4: meaning it's all good shit. I gave it three stars due to the fact that the actual smoke sessions didn't live up to the hype.”"

column3: “My boyfriend was really energetic, he cleaned his room for hours. He kept himself busy the whole time, i was amazed how well it was on him”

“i was stucc in a trance of happiness and was focused on the movie i was watching at the moment, i felt a lil fuzzy in myind but nothing too serious. overall it was a great high and i can't wait to smoke the rest of my cookies stash lol”

“I think this may be a new favorite! Not the best taste, but anxiety down, got a good workout and housework done. It hit a little strong ( which is good considering my tolerance has been a little high). It's been a few hours and I'm still feeling it. Would definitely recommend!”
“that's the stuff”
“The beautiful people at L'eagle have created a masterpiece in their Gsc.  Supremely good flavor prof and the high exceeds.  I'm glad this stuff exists.  ns”

“this is my favorite strain and I think I know enough about it to say that it is Sensei Star and Durban Poison I don't know where the OG came from whoever wrote this I'm afraid they're wrong but if I'm wrong Wow”

“This stuff smells and hits great. Although I fell asleep shortly after smoking this I did find that I woke up still feeling a bit of the effects the next morning.”
“one of my favorite”

“GSC is an all time fave”
“Definitely my all time favorite strain! Does wonders for my back pain and other ailments!”

The first few seven samples of GSC that I've tried have had absolutely no affect on me.

Be careful, it does sneak up on you a bit.
Very potent.”

“When I smoked my first bowl of this strain I thought I was dying. Like my vision was fucked up, my heart felt really hot and I was going deaf but it quickly went away. After that I just did stupid shit with my friend. One of the best strains I've smoked, and one of the best highs I've ever had.”

Cheers!

Mat

column1: For those of you who are familiar with my reviews

column3: “Very powergul high. Smells sort of earthy sorta like cookie dough but also smells like green. tastes very earthy. the high kicks in right away . very calming high. had horrible munchies”

“Very tasty. The batch I had actually did have a smell like cookies. I didn't notice it until I left the house for a ride on my bike and returned home. Upon walking in I noticed the sweet cookie tones. I was relaxed and energetic and rode around my neighborhood steady and smooth. An enjoyable strain.”
“man i love this strain it made feel good and up up up not lazy and sleepy.”

Nothing disappointing about this strain right here.”

Euphoric body and head high, very relaxing and very little raciness. After ...”
